string.name: number1
string.htmlData:
1. MUTEYA BUHA ENGUBI
Watchman Blow The Trumpet
CH 619-Doh is Bb

1. Muteya buha engubi, Ukunge mundu ghosi Oyukow’engulu eyi, Atsire amalolo.

Erisuba mo :
Muteya we buh’engubi, Ibughaye kutsibu Minyisy’abosi engulu, Balwe omo miriki.

2. Ubuhire y’oko bitwa, Omoli n’omo misya; Kandi n’omo ngetsi hosi, Baminye erilama.

3. Ubughaye y’omo nzira, N’ahabisire hosi; Tat’akabalindirira, Byosi byabiryusula.

4. Buhira abatohire, Nabo balamibawe, Yesu akabirikira, Mwase mulamibawe.

string.name: number2
string.htmlData:
2. OMUKAMA ANEMWASA
The Coming King
CH 546-Doh is G

1. Omukama anemwasa, Oyowatwanza kwenene ; Anemwasa erilamya, Abamwasi bosi

Erisuba mo :
Ko luyi, ko luyi, Mwami Yesu any’oko luyi Anemwasa, anemwasa, Mulamya oko luyi.

2. Binyikalo by’endata, Byabiriberererera; Linw’endambi y’erilama, Lero mwikirirye.

3. Amalwa asyaby’atyahwa, Sihendisyabya buholo; Nikw’ebibi n’oluholo, Byasyaghuswa kundu.

4. Nery’omo kihugho kihya, Twasikala n’erikota, Sihendisyaby’oluholo, Hate n’obulighe.

string.name: number3
string.htmlData:
3. NASYAMULANGIRA
Face To Face
CH 545-Doh is Bb (Moderato)

1. Nasyamulangira Yesu, Tuli nay’elubula ; Aho nasyamuminyira, Kwali yo wanyikwira.

Erisuba mo :
Nasyamulangira Yesu, Tuli nay’elubula, Nyiminy’erihenia liwe, nasyamupipa kundu.

2. Lino ngamulindirira, Akandisyasa kandi ; Ekiro akandisyasa, Ngandisyamulola ko.

3. Twasyatsemera ewuwe, Ahate n’omulighe ; Abatyowa wabiryowa, Ah’omwirimya ate.

4. Twasyatsemer’élubula, Nasyamulangira yo, Nasyabya na Yesu Kristo, Y’Omulamiya waghe.

string.name: number4
string.htmlData:
4. ASYASA
He’s Coming
CH 669-Doh is Bb (Moderato)

1. Hali engulu yowene eyo buholo, Yabirilwa hali kutsibu ; Kusangwa Omulamya anemwendisyasa, Kandy’asimya Obwami buwe.

Erisuba mo :
Asyasa, nyasi akandisyasa, Nikw’asyasa kundu kundu, Abaghendi bosi, baluha basyaluhukibwa na Nyamuhanga.

2. Amasinda asyakingukal’ekirw’ekyo, Wa Babuyirir’emuliro ; Esyondeko syabaghotsere ekulimu, basyikala muna kihugho.

3. Sihali kindi kikasyatughana kandi, tukandisyimba obutseme ; Ababiritongolibwa basyalw’ehosi, Basyapipa Omwami wabo.

4. Haleluy’amina, Haleluy’erikota, Twamasikya twasyikala yo, Uby’unnasikire kandi ubye n’amaha, Lero wasyambal’Akakira.

string.name: number5
string.htmlData:
5. MUTEYA WE MINYISY’ENDAMBI
How Far From Homa
CH 665-Doh is Eb

1. Muteya we misnyisy’endambi, Ewetu ni hali kwehi ? Ati : Mwirimya ni munene, Nikwa bukandikya, Sighulire, genda luba, Suleke erikirirya, Nikwa ekiro wasyahika, Kiro ky’erikota.

2. Umubwire kyabugha nawe, Anzubirya ndeke ati : Amalwa akisiyinahwa, Sulwe omo malwa, Sughubahe, sukw’obuba, Yitsinge oko mubiri, Nikwa twasyaban’ébihembo, Twamabisangana.

3. Ngabulaya ebyabumbawa, Bikanyisubirya bitya: Ekihugho kikandisyahwa ho, hasyasa ekindi. Sulir’ebiminyikalo, Bikakangaya hotuli, Ebindu byosi byabumbawa bilindir’engubi.

4. Ewetu si hali kutsibu, Tutseme omo Mitima, Tuhumule ko twasyalama butsira bulighe. Sulire twasyahika yo, Bulighe bukandisyahwa, Sitwendisyabul’obuholo mo Muyi wa Tata.

string.name: number6
string.htmlData:
6. IMWE BABUYIRIRE
Watch Ye Saints
CH 549-Doh is Db

1. Imwe ababuyirire, Muteghaye biro byosi ;
Muhamb’esiseke syenyu, Lind’Omwamy’ali hakuhi.

Erisuba mo :
Omwami, anemwasa. Anemwasa n’erihenia, Yesu arimya engoma, Omwami, anemwasa.

2. Wibuk’Omuhanganiri, Erilamya n’olukogho ; Embita n’erisimibwa, Wibuk’erilama eryo.

3. Sihaly’amami atehwa, Wowe esyongali siwe ; Bwir’abosi olukogho, Ni ndambi y’erilamibwa.

4. Ebihanda byasyahwa ho, Kristo let’Obwami bwawe, Kihugho kisiy’ikahwa, Mutseme babirilama.

string.name: number7
string.htmlData:
7. ASYASWASA, ASYASWASA
When He Comes
CH 415-Doh is E (Moderato)

1. Asyaswasa, Asyaswasa Omulamya wetu, Asyatwala, Asyatwala abandu buwe.

Erisuba mo :
Twasyatsema kutsibu, Erya ewa Yesu. N’erikota na kera, Situlilwa yo.

2. Imwe bosi mwangaminya Omwatsi wa Yesu ; Mwangakwama n’omutima, Imwasyalama.

3. Yesu Kristo asyaswasa, Ekiro tutasi ; Umulinde, umulinde ng’Omwami wawe.

string.name: number8
string.htmlData:
8. EKIRO YESU ASYATWENDA
When The Trumpet
C.S. 865-Doh is Ab

1. Ekiro Yesu akasyatwenda abandu buwe; N’engunga ya Yesu ikasyabugha, Abandu buwe bosi bakandisyalwa mwisinda Twasyahindana erya elubula.

Erisuba mo :
Nasyabya yo elubula, Haghuma na Yesu Kristo, Nasyabya yo elubula: Ngandikwama Yesu mo nzira syosi.

2. Yesu amatubirikira omo mitima yetu ; Syanzire abandu bakasyahera Twamaleka ebibi byosi bya balimu babi, Yesu angatulamya lino lino.

3. Inga tukole omubiri wa Yesu gho luba ; Omwirimya akasyahika luba, N’abandu bangi sibasi Omulamiya wetu Tubirikire bo balame lino.

string.name: number9
string.htmlData:
9. BUHA ENGUBI
Lift Up the Trumpet
CH 541-Doh is Ab

1. Buha engubi bosi bowe yo, Yesu akandisyasa ; Neryo mwimbe banze n’obutseme : Yesu akandisyasa.

Erisuba mo :
Asyahika, Asyahika,Omwami akasyasa.

2. Kangiriraya ehosi-hosi, Yesu akandisyasa ; Asyasa n’erihenia ering : Yesu akandisyasa.

3. Neryo buh’engubi omo ngetsi, Yesu akandisyasa ; Buhir’engubi n’omo biharo: Yesu akandisyasa.

4. Neryo buh’engubi n’omo bitwa, Yesu akandisyasa ; Emyatsi ikaghend’omwihunga : Yesu akandisyasa.

5. Linw’ebihanda byamatsurana, Yesu akandisyasa ; Amenge amakanya uminye : Yesu akandisyasa.

string.name: number10
string.htmlData:
10. TWASYAHINDANA ELUBULA
Shall We Gather
CH 555-Doh is Eb

1. Twasyahindan’élubula, Oko wetu ewa Yesu ; Abandu ababiryanza, batsemire kutsibu-tsibu.

Erisuba mo :
Twasyahindan’élubula, Oko lusi lubuya olw’engebe, Bandu bosi batsemire eyo, Endambi syosi bane yo.

2. Baliyo bakimb’olwimbo, Obulighe sibuli yo ; Olwimbo lwa Yesu Kristo, Omukama Munene wetu.

3. Esiseke sisiri yo, Omwirimya ahwere yo ; Yesu Kristo ni Luseke Olwa bandu bosi abiwe.

4. Abayo bali n’amaka, Sibelwala n’erihola ; Ebibi byosi byamahwa, Sibyangatok’eringira yo.

string.name: number11
string.htmlData:
11. MULAMYA NGANDIKUKWAMA
I Will Follow Thee
CH 266-Doh is Ab

1. Mulamya ngandikukwama, Aho wanzire hosi ; Aho ukaya ngukwame, Mwami ngandikukwama.

Erisuba mo :
Mulamya ngandikukwama, wanyutir’omusasi Wamabul’oyu kwanzire, Ingye ngandikukwama..

2. Nahw’enzira yamakingwa, Naho yamasendibwa ; Mowalaba muyo kera, Ndabemo ngwit’ihenia.

3. Naho wamabya n’endwala, Ngalengwa ko kutsibu ; Wabirirengwa ko nawe, Mwami ngandikukwama.

4. Wamandaby’omo bulighe, Lero namabya Mwera ; Nawe mowabya Omwera, Naghe ngandikukwama.

5. Nomo wangananyitwala No omo mutobero ; Nawe mowasoka utya, Naghe ngandikukwama

string.name: number12
string.htmlData:
12. HALI EYISOKO YOSWIRE
There Is A Fountain
CH 163-Doh is C

1. Hali eyisoko yoswire, N’omusasi wa Yesu Kristo ; Oyo anzire erihenia, Angahika ku Yesu, Asyalusibwa ko ebibi, N’engumbu y’enzira nyibi, Oyo anzire erihenia, Angahika ku Yesu.

2. Itwe tunemutsema lingi, Twabiribana Omulamya ; Ali n’akaghala kanene, K’erikinda Sitani. Yesu mwakinda oluholo, Mwalubuka omwisinda, Ali n’akaghala kanene, k’erikinda Sitani.

3. Oyo abirikw’oko muti, Akandisyahika akandi ; N’erisyatutwala eghuwe, Ahate n’omulighe. Tusikaye erina riwe, Tumuh’emitima yetu; Tukandisyahika ewuwe, Ahate n’obiulighe.

4. Mwami nyinemukuhalya ko, Mba erikirirya ry’ekundu ; N’omusasi wawe anyerye, Mba akalamu kawe, Mba akalamu kawe Yesu mban’erilamibwa Nawe; N’omusasi wawe anyerye, Mba akalamu kawe.

string.name: number13
string.htmlData:
13. NYIHENAYE KWILAB’AMATWA
Lord Jesus, I Long To Be Perfectly Whole
CH 592-Doh is A

1. Mwami Yesu nyanzire kunzondola Nyanzire ubye mo mutima waghe Inaleka erisaba esyisumba, Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.

Erisuba mo :
Nyihenaye kwilab’amatwa, Umba eryera ngandikutsemesya.

2. Mwami undebay’ighune n’ewawe, Mba eriher’obuhere bowene. Butsira eritikatika nyiyihe Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.

3. Yesu nyinemukulirira lino ; Nyitoke erikulinda Mukama. Unyuwanaye omo Musasi wawe, Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.

4. Mulamya nyinemukulindirira ; Yesu as’umbe omutim’owene Suliwaghan’omundu n’omughuma, Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.

string.name: number14
string.htmlData:
14. WOWE AMAKUTA
Hear The Pennies Dropping
CH 555-Doh is Eb

1. Ghowe amakuta, anemutogha ; Ghosi ni wa Yesu, tumutekere.

Erisuba mo :
Togha, togha, togha, togha amakut’ayo, Ghosi ni wa Yesu, Tumutekere.

2. Akalw’omo byala, Anemutogha ; Buhere bwa Yesu, Ko Bana buwe.

3. Lino tuli Bana, N’ekyo tuwite ; Neryo twamakula, Tukandikanya.

4. Twamayira bike, Tubihy’Omwami ; Asyangirira byo, Atulamaye.

string.name: number15
string.htmlData:
15. YESU KRISTO MWANYANZA
Jesus Loves Me
C.S. 283-Doh is Eb

1. Yesu Kristo mwanyanza, mwaliha olubanza ; Ingye ndi mundu molo, Naye ni wa Kaghala.

Erisuba mo :
Yesu anzire, abandu bosi, Monzo ni Mwenge, Ekyo ni wasingya.

2. Yesu Kristo anzire, Imwe ab’ekihugho; Kumbe mwamabinduka, Iniabah’erilama.

3. Yesu Kristo Mukama, Unyilamaya lino ; Namaleka Sitani, N’ebibi byosi byaghe.

4. Yesu Kristo wasyasa, Wasyanyitwal’ewawe ; Ngandikol’omubiri, Inakulindirira.

string.name: number16
string.htmlData:
16. WERAY’EBYALA BYAGHE
I Washed My Hands
C.S. 569-Doh is Ab

1. Weray’ebyala byaghe, Byere kundu kundu ; Ko nabiriha Yesu, Byangamukolera.

Erisuba mo :
Sinendiy’ahandi, N’erimusigha, N’erisiky’oghundi, Ni nawe Yesu.

2. Ndegh’amatwi n’eryowa, Nyikol’ébibuya ; Ebyo ngowa ambwira, Bustir’italya byo.

3. Ngateghay’amaboko, Ebyo angakola; Ngunge kw’eryendererya, Akolere Yesu.

string.name: number17
string.htmlData:
17. NYIPIPIRE OLWANZO
‘Tis Love That Makes Us Happy
C.S. 567-Doh is Bb

1. Nyipipire Olwanzo, Lolukanyibwira ; Riyirira bandi ndeke, Bangaminya Yesu.

Erisuba mo :
Tata we ingye mwana wawe, Tata we ngukwamirire; Nyipipire Olwanzo, Lolukanyibwira Riyirira bandi ndeke, Bangaminya Yesu.

2. Ekihugho ky’ebibi, Buligh’erihola ; Sibingaghe erikol’omubiri wa Yesu.

3. Byasyabya byabihwa ho, Twasyay’elubula ; Twasyabya tukamupipa Omwami gh’olwanzo.

string.name: number18
string.htmlData:
18. TUGHENDE ABASIRIKANI
Onward Christian Soldiers
CH 360-Doh is E

1. Twend’abasirikani, Bandu b’Omwami; Yesu an’embere, Tumukwamire, Tutwaly’omusalama, Atuby’embere, Tukwamirir’eriyalwa tukind’Enzighu:

Erisuba mo :
Tughende Abasirikani, Tuyalwe twe bose, Tughende na Yesu, Tukind’Enzighu.

2. Endeko sya Sitani, Syamakw’obuba; Syamowa Omwami, Isyatibita, Obutseme bw’Ababuyirire kundu; Banemupipa Omwami n’erimusima.

3. E Kanisa y’Omwami ine haghuma; Inemuhangana, Eriyakinda, Siyendighabana ho, Erikirirya; Erikangiriry’ighuma, Mwami Mughuma.

4. Sihaly’Amamy’atehwa, akandisyahwa; Neryo e Kanisa, Ikaksyakota, Kulimu n’oluholo, Sibyesyakinda; Kristo abirilaghana Syaliyiteba.

5. Neryo muyalwe bosi, Tutimbatimbe; Twimbire haghuma, Mirenge yetu. Tumwimbire, tusime, Omwami Yesu, Warihenia lyeryubahwa, kwilaba bosi.

string.name: number19
string.htmlData:
19. LEBAYA SUTEBAWE
My Soul, Be On Thy Guard
CH 358-Doh is C

1. Lebaya sutebawe, Ebibi byatimba ; Bikasa eritimba-timba, Mbusuy’elubula.

2. Lebay’iwe usabe, Sulwe omo malwa ; Uhangan’ebiro byosi, Yes’akuwatikya.

3. Uwe suliwakinda, Susighe engabo ; Lebay’amalw’asyahwa, Wasimya akakira.

string.name: number20
string.htmlData:
20. IBUK’OMUTIMA WAWE
Awake My Soul
CH 355-Doh is G

1. Ibuk’omutima waghe, Sonda-sonda byowene ; Ulw’amalwa aghowene, Wasyakokibwa yo.

2. Omukama akusonda, Ghenda luba witabe ; Omukama asyahemba, Ababirikinda.

3. Endeko yikalebaya, Ikakulindirira ; Siwibuke eby’ enyuma, Lol’embere syawe.

4. Mulamya wetu twanzire, Tukasingana kuwe ; Twamasa erikupipa, Tunakusikirye.

string.name: number21
string.htmlData:
21. NASA KU MUSALABA
I Am Coming To The Cross
CH 600-Doh is G

1. Nasa ku musalaba, Nduhire, mwera, mumu; Sindisagha na hake, Ngasonda iwo wene.

Erisuba mo :
Mwami indi n’amahga, Mulamya waghe Mwenge, Nyikangy’embere syawe, Mwami Yesu, nyilamye.

2. Nayitsutsa We kera, Mo bulighe bw’ebibi; Yesu mwambwira ati: Asa, Ngakulamaye.

3. Lino nayihaghura, Sinyibuk’ekihugho; Mbye wawe, Mwami Yesu, Imay’ebyaghe byosi.

4. Ndi n’amaha w’ebyawe, Wanywutir’omusasi ; Lino namayikangya, Indi ku Musalaba.

5. Nzemire namalama, Yesu kaghala kaghe; Sindi ho n’ekitingu, Nyipipire Embuli.

string.name: number22
string.htmlData:
22. MUYISA, MUYISA
Lord, I Hear
CH 208-Doh is G

1. Mwami mb’Omuyisa wawe, Uhitaye gho busa ; We Mulamya sundabe ko, Neryo mba Omuyisa.

Erisuba mo :
Muyisa, Muyisa, Nery’umbe Omuyisa.

2. Sunzighe Tata Mubuya, Ebibi byamanduhya ; Ndolere owerighuswa, Nikwa unyighenyere.

3. Namabulir’omo bibi, Namakuhitaniya; Namatimbwa n’ekihugho, Undusaye mo lino.

4. S’undabe ko Omukama, Nyiribule ameso ; Unyiminyisaye Tata, Nzire eby’ekihugho.

string.name: number23
string.htmlData:
23. NYUSULE
Hover O’er Men Holy Spirit
CH 212-Doh is G

1. Kirimu Kibuyirire, Asa ngasibe nawe ; Nyusul’omuyisa wawe, Asa, asa nyusule.

Erisuba mo :
Nyusule, nyusule, Yesu asa nyusule; Nyusul’omuyisa wawe, Asa asa nyusule.

2. Wangatok’erinyusula, Nibya ingye sinyasi ; Kirimu kya Nyamuhanga, Asa, asa nyusule.

3. Sinyikalir’indi molo, Nyinekunamira ; Musibikya w’elubula, Mba olwanzo, nyusule.

4. Wase nyere kandi ndame, Luhukya Omutima ; Niwe ukambumulaya, Unyusulaye lino.

string.name: number24
string.htmlData:
24. NYIKWANZIRE MWAMI
I Need Thee Every Hour
CH 258-Doh is Ab

1. Nyikwanzire Mwami, Omulamya waghe ; Omulenge wawe, Kalet’obuholo.

Erisuba mo :
Mwitungi n’omo kiro, Nyikwanzire Mwami, Unzumule Mulamya, Tusibe nawe.

2. Nyikwanzire Mwami, Mbye hakuhi nawe ; Ndok’ikind’enzighu, Ndi haghuma nawe.

3. Nyikwanzire Mwami, Butseme, bulighe ; Asa, lino-lino : Nyitok’eryeribwa.

4. Nyikwanzire Mwami, Mbwir’ebyo wanzire ; Unyibegheraye, Mukama, Mulamya.

5. Nyikwanzire Mwami, Mwamy’owene kundu ; Nzondole mbye wawe, Uwe Mutsumulwa.

string.name: number25
string.htmlData:
25. NYIKUH’EBYOSI
All To Jesus, I Surrender
CH 573-Doh is D

1. Yesu mbye wawe, nyikokye, n’ebyaghe ngwite byosi ; Nyikwanzire ngwikirirye, Ngukwame ndambi syosi.

Erisuba mo :
Nyikuh’ebyosi, nyikuh’ebyosi, Mulamya waghe Mubuya, Nyikuh’ebyosi.

2. Yesu ndi wawe, nyikokye, Ingye muke ngusabe ; Namughut’eby’ekihugho, Lino Yesu nyikokye.

3. Yesu ndi wawe nyikokye, Mwami nyibye o wawe ; Tum’Omusibiky’Ambwire, Ko nabiribya Wawe.

4. Yesu nyikuhe ebyosi, Musibikya, Mutima ; Nyipipe erighanyira, Ngusab’ebiro byosi.

string.name: number26
string.htmlData:
26. NYINEMWASA KO NDI
Just As I Am
CH 222-Doh is Eb

1. Lino nyinemwasa ko ndi, Mulamya, Ndamaye n’omusasi wawe ; Nyitaby’omuleng’akambirikira : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.

2. Lino nyinemwasa ko ndi, Mulamya, Nyeray’omutima kw’ebibi ; Uwe mweny’omusasi w’erilamya : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.

3. Nyinemwasa ebibi byamanduhya, Ngakindawa ebiro byosi ; Hali bingi ebikanyitimba ko : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.

4. Lino nyinemwasa ngye ndi, Muhanya, ndi ne mumu, ndi na mutsiha ; Ebyanganyerya ngabisung’ewawe : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.

5. Lino nyinemwasa Unyikokaye, Nyusulaye erikirirya ; Nyitok’ikinda ebikandebaya : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.

6. Lino nyinemwasa, mba Lwanzo Lwawe, Iwambohol’omo miriki ; Eritsuka lino namabya wawe : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga..

string.name: number27
string.htmlData:
27. MWAMI NI MWENGE
We Praise Thee O Lord
C.S. 396-Doh is G

1. Mwami ni Mwenge, ka mwatuma Yesu ; N’eritulamya lino mo nzira nyibi.

Erisuba mo :
Haleluya tumukwame, Haleluya kundu, Haleluya Yesu Kristo, Utulamaye.

2. Tuyire Yesu, Munene ng’Omwami ; Kusangw’abirihola n’eritulamya.

3. Utusulaye, no Lwanzo lo Lwawe ; N’obuteseme bunene, Bw’ebiro vyosi.

4. Tulek’ebindu, By’ekihugho kino ; Tukwame Yesu Kristo Mukama wetu.

5. Tuhe omuhwa, Tusulaye kundu ; Omundu mundu, Akwanze kundu kundu.

string.name: number28
string.htmlData:
28. NGASONDA ERYERA
Take Time To Be Holy
CH 603-Doh is F

1. Ngasonde eryera, Saba suluhe, Usibe n’Omwami, Umusikaye; Wanze Abakristo, Lamy’Abakoni, Siwibirirawe, Erimusaba.

2. Ngasonde eryera, Bungi bw’ebibi, Usibe na Yesu, Ahabisire ; Umusamalire, Wasyabya nga Ye, Bosi basyaminya, Kumusosire.

3. Ngasonde eryera, Akusondole, Eriyibombeka embere siwe, Ko wanabya kosi, Wasyamubwira; Usikaye Yesu, Umowe lino.

4. Ngasonde eryra, Kungo’omutima, Lengekania ndeke, Suyire luba; Wowe Musibikya, Ubye n’olwanzo, Wasyatunganana, Riy’elubula.

string.name: number29
string.htmlData:
29. UBYE NETU
Abide With Us
CH 50-Doh is Eb

1. Ubye netu n’akaghala kwe, Netu sitwangubaha Sitani, Mo mwirimya w’ekihugho kino, Wangabya luseke lwetu, Kristo.

2. Ubye netu n’erihenia lyawe, Biro ni bike eby’ekihugho, N’Abandu bangabindu luba, Uwe w’Erikota, Ubye netu.

3. Unye netu emighulu yosi, Nindi angatulamya kw’ebibi? Nindi angatuhangania nga We? Tukayiketera We Mukama.

4. Ubye netu, Tata w’Erikota ; Tughaniray’oluholo lwawe, Tukulinde k’omubiri wawe, Yesu Mulamiya, ubye netu.

string.name: number30
string.htmlData:
30. ULANGIRE BWAMIRA
Day Is Dying In The West
CH 51-Doh is Ab

1. Ulangire bwamira, Bwirire, tuluhuke ; Ebyakakala by’ekiro, Byaka tusabe Omwami, Itwe bosi.

Erisuba mo :
Mwenge, Mwenge, Mwenge : Mwami Yesu, Wayitsungany’ehosi, Byosi bikakupipa : Nyamuhanga.

2. Omwami gho Buyingo, Hindany’abakwanzire ; Ubusulaye olwanzo, Ubabindule mo bawe : Bakupipe.

3. Omwirimya akanya, Tukingir’ighenyera ; Tukutwalir’emitima yetu, omo Bwami bwawe : Nyamuhanga.

4. Utuh’erikirirya, Twasyahola Mukama; Twasyabana kyakakala, N’omwirimya asyahwa ho: Tukupipe.

string.name: number31
string.htmlData:
31. LYUBA LY’OMUTIMA
Sun of My Soul
CH 321-Doh is f

1. Omulamya Lyuba ly’Omutima; Omwirimya syahika ewuwe, Wamabya hakuhi mwami, Sinendisyubaha na hake.

2. Omughulu w’eriyaghotsera, Ngaluhuka emibiri yosi. Umb’erikulengekania, Ngotser’indi haghuma nawe.

3. Undind’omo kiro no mwitungi; Sinangatoka tute haghuma, Undinde omo malighe, Kusangwa singwite amaka.

4. Omughulu nyinemwendibuka; Na ho ngandiya eriyakola, Omo kiro no mwitungi Kusangwa Iwe kyakakala.

string.name: number32
string.htmlData:
32. YESU NIWE RIBWE
The Lord’s Our Rock
CH 505-Doh is F

1. Yesu niwe Ribwe ryetu, Obuwamo bw’eritsuku ; Niw’utulamya malighe, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.

Erisuba mo :
Ribwe, busayiro bw’abandu, Kitsutsu ky’eriluhukira; Musondoli, Utetalaya, Obuwamo bw’eritsuku.

2. Anyilamya omwaghalwa, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku ; Tuli nawe sindyubaha, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.

3. Emigheri yamasenda, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku ; N’Omulamya wetu kundu, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.

4. Ribwe kundu, ry’erilamya, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku ; Tuwatikye mo malighe, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.

string.name: number33
string.htmlData:
33. AKANZONDOLA
He Leadeth Me
CH 393-Doh is D

1. Nyitsemire Omulamya, Akangung’omo Binywa biwe ; Aho ngaya n’erikola, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.

Erisuba mo :
Nyitsemire akanzondola, Yesu Musondoli w’ekwenene, Nyanzire erimukolera, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.

2. Namabya ndi mo bulighe, Kutse nyitsemire kutsibu ; Mo buholo, n’eryaghalwa, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.

3. Mwami nyanzire tusibe Nawe sinyiyitonge-tonge ; Nyibye n’obutseme kundu, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.

4. Mibiri yaghe yamahwa, Nginde omwighenyera lyawe ; Sindyubaha n’oluholo, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.

string.name: number34
string.htmlData:
34. NDI N’OBUHOLO MO MUTIMA
When Peace Like A River
CH 31-Doh is E

1. Nyanzir’obuholo bombomba ng’olusi, Naho nabya n’obulighe ; Ko nyiri kosi nyanzir’éribugha: Ndi n’obuholo mo mutima.

Erisuba mo :
Buholo, Bubuya, Ndi n’obuholo mo mutima.

2. Sitani andebya ngabya n’obuhanua, Ngwity’amaha w’eriminya ; Nikwa Kristo mwasunga ko ndi molo, Kyatuma iniut’omusasi.

3. Nzemire kutsibu, nabiribuyirwa, Sihasigher’ekighuma ; Mobyabambwa nawe ko Musalaba, Mutima waghe sim’Omwami.

4. Mwami Yesu kiro wasyas’eritwenda, Kirw’ebitu byasyalundwa ; Engub’ibughe, Omwamy’andaghale, Ndi n’obuholo mo mutima.

string.name: number35
string.htmlData:
35. NYANZIRY’OBWIRA
What a Fellowship
CH 611-Doh is A

1. Nyanzir’obwira b’omo lubula, N’amaboko waw’erikota ; Nzemire kundu, nyinasikire, N’amaboko waw’erikota.

Erisuba mo :
Ndame, Ndama, N’amaboko waw’erikota, Ndame, Ndama, N’amaboko waw’erikota.

2. Nzemire ko Yesu anzondola, N’amaboko waw’erikota; Nzungir’amaka atunganene, N’amaboko waw’erikota.

3. Singwire buba, Nyinasikire, N’amaboko waw’erikota ; Namahehera, Nyitunganene, N’amaboko waw’erikota.

string.name: number36
string.htmlData:
36. NAMAKWIKIRIRYA
My Faith Looks Up To Thee
CH 246-Doh is Eb

1. Namakwikirirya, Mbuli ye Kalwari : We Mulamya; ngusabe unyowe, Ndamaye kw’ebibi: Eritsuka lino, ngukwamire.

2. Nyusul’ighenyera, mba mbita yowene: Mba omuhwa Ko wanyiholera, Ngukangay’olwanzo; Lutehwa lukaka ng’omuliro.

3. Bibi byamatimba, ngayir’obulighe : Unzondole, Ndusy’omo mwirimya, Ndusaye kw’ebibi; Kandi sundekere hali Kuwe.

string.name: number37
string.htmlData:
37. MBYE HAKUHI NAWE
Nearer My God To Thee
CH 382-Doh is G

1. Mbye hakuhi nawe, Mwami wetu, Mo nangahanikwa ko Musalaba ; Nabya nyinemwimba, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.

2. Mbye hakuhi nawe Mwami wetu, Mo Malighe ghosi, Umbanganire. Yesu twikalaye, Tuh’erisasira, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.

3. Mbye hakuhi nawe, Mwami wetu ; Unyihanganire ebiro byosi. Enzighu yamasa, Unyibwire Mwami, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.

4. Mbye hakuhi nawe, Mwami wetu ; Wabirikingula, Omo lubula, Mulikyetu sika, Ukandilamibwa, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.

string.name: number38
string.htmlData:
38. TUKASIKIRA KU KRISTO OLUKUKA
Firmly Stand For God
CH 509-Doh is Eb

1. Iwe ghuyitsinge sighuluwe, Nomo wangowa ebikalire ; Wasyahanganibwa n’Olukuka, Twamatimbwa n’ebibi.

Erisuba mo :
Tukasikira ku Kristo Olukuka, We Lukuka tweghemere, Tubye n’obuholo, n’erisasira: Muliro wa Nyamuhanga.

2. Yitsinge by’unasikire, Hatikana bya n’erikirirya ; Lukuka lukatuh’erikinda, Muna kihugho ky’ebibi.

3. Yitsinge kundu binatolere, Sighumbaye wasyahabw’isimi, Lukuka lukatuh’obuholo, Twabikind’ebibi byosi.

string.name: number39
string.htmlData:
39. NASYABYA NYINIKIRIRYE
My Hope is Built
CH 581-Doh is G

1. Nasyabya nyinikirirye, Musasi gh’Omulamya, Sinendisyakwama ghundi, Nina Yesu Iyo wene.

Erisuba mo :
Kuwe Yesu namimana, Nikwa handi ni museghe, Nikwa handi ni museghe.

2. Omwirimy anyiribya, Yesu niw’erighenyera; Mo Malighe n’obuhanya, Syendisyatusighania.

3. Nyeribawe mo Musasi, Yo wamba erimukwama ; Nangabya omo bulighe, Akangwatiky’inyanzikya.

4. Inyasyasa ngo mulenge, Ow’Engunga yisikire ; Nyambal’eritunganene, Sinendibya n’ekitingu.

string.name: number40
string.htmlData:
40. MWIKIRIRYE, MUSIKAYE
Trsut And Obey
CH 582-Doh is F

1. Twikale n’Omwami, Twowe ekinyw’ekyo, atuhir’omo nzira mbuya, Tusikaye kundu, Akikale netu, n’abamwikirirye abosi.

Erisuba mo :
Musikaye, sihali erindi ilama, Yesu musa, Mwikirirye kundu,

2. Sihali nzukula, bitu bihindane, Amaseka ibyaseghera; Sihali n’obuba, kutse n’eryubaha, Bikahwa twamamwikirirya.

3. Sitwendighalibwa, kutse n’obulighe, Niw’utuhembula kutsibu ; Sihali obwera, sihali ryaghalwa, Twasyatsumulwa twamasikya.

4. Sitwangayitsutsa, Riyir’obutseme, Twabirek’ebibi byosi ; Kw’ighenyera Liwe, Hitya ahitaye, N’isimi ry’Ababuyirire.

5. Twasyatsemerayo, Haghuma n’Omwami, Twasyabya Naye n’erikota ; Tusikaye kundu, Asyabyatutuma, Sitwendisyubaha na hake.

string.name: number41
string.htmlData:
41. YESU ABYE NAWE EHOSI
God Be With You
CH 35-Doh is D

1. Yesu abye nawe ehosi, Neryo twikale haghuma, Akalembera n’amenge, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.

Erisuba mo :
Ekiro twasyahindana yo, Twasyabya haghuma na Yesu, Ekiro twasyahindana yo, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.

2. Yesu abye nawe ehosi, Akulind’omo malighe, Asyakulembera kundu, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.

3. Yesu abye nawe ehosi, No ko ndambi y’amalighe, Akuwaty’oko kuboko, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.

4. Yesu abye nawe ehosi, Asyakutsumula kundu, Abatulîre enzîra, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.

string.name: number42
string.htmlData:
42. TWAMIKALA N’ABIRA
With Friends On Earth
C.S. 866-Doh is Bb

1. Twamikala n’abira betu sitwendikw’engitsi, Nikwa twamabighabana, Tukabya n’obulighe.

Erisuba mo :
Kihugho sitweghabana, Twasabya haghuma Mo Kihugho ky’Obuholo, Sitwandighabana.

2. Twamibuka abira betu, Tukatsema kundu, Twasyabugh’emibiri yetu, Twasyakotera yo.

3. Sitwendisya-swalaghana yo, Twahik’elubula Twasyaban’eritsema ringi, Twimbe ndambi syosi.

string.name: number43
string.htmlData:
43. RIHOL’EMWISI WA YESU
Asleep In Jesus
CH 489-Doh is D

1. Rihol’emwisi wa Yesu, Oko Babuya niya to; Sibebuka n’eririra, Eyo sibangatebibwa.

2. Eriya to omu Yesu, Ni Buluhuke bubuya. Ni butseme bw’abamwasi, Ko basyahabwa engebe.

3. Eriya to omu Yesu, N’eribukibwa mo Naye, N’akaghala k’Omulamya, Sikekindwa n’oluholo.

4. Eriya to omu Yesu, Bakasyowa omulenge, Asisinda syakingulwa, Abuwe bosi balame

string.name: number44
string.htmlData:
44. OMUGHULU MUBÎRÎ WAGHE AHWERE
When My Life Work Is Ended
C.S. 849-Doh is Ab

1. Omughulu mubiri waghe ahwere hano, Ngandihike elubula habuya, Nasyamuminya Omutongolya waghe luba N’akandisyatsuka erinyikokya.

Erisuba mo :
Nasyaminya Yesu Kristo, Kusangwa abirinyitongolya, Nasyaminya Yesu Kristo, N’esyongolu omo byala biwe.

2. Abakristo bangi, baghendire emuliro, Bakatulinda n’obuholo buwe; Twasyatsema haghuma emuliro wa Yesu Nikwa nyanzire Mukama ko bosi.

3. Nganditsema erilangira obusu buwe, N’olwanzo luli oko meso wuwe. Ngandisyamupipa busana n’olwanzo luwe N’obwenge buwe bwabirinyilamya.

string.name: number45
string.htmlData:
45. UMBE BIBLIA
Give Me The Bible
CH 655-Doh is Ab

1. Umbe Bibliya yo yikanzemesya, Unyisondolere muyo Mwami, Ekyakakala kyayo sikyerima, Ko Yesu mwasa eritowisya.

Erisuba mo :
Umbe Bibliya yo yikanzemesya, Nzondolwe nay’omo nzira nyike Amatehgeko wayo gho mabuya, Akaminyisay’enzira kundu.

2. Umbe Bibliya mo malighe waghe, Omughulu ngatimwa n’ebibi, Umb’ebinywa ebyo Yesu abugha, Nikwa yowen’akambumulaya.

3. Umbe Bibliy’ingoleraye kundu, Kand’indind’ebitegho by’ahisi, Lo Luseke lukak’omo mwirimya, ‘Lwakangya enzira y’obuholo.

4. Umbe Bibliy’imbwir’eby’obuyingo, Kandi Utusibikaye muyo, Tuminy’enzira ikay’elubula, Tulol’okwihenia lyawe Tata.

string.name: number46
string.htmlData:
46. EBINYWA BY’ENGEBE
Sing Them Over Again
CH 574-Doh is G

1. Akandi wanganyibwira, Ebinywa eby’engebe, Ebisihire kwenene, Ebinywa by’engebe; Ebinywa bilabire, Ebyosi eby’abandu.

Erisuba mo :
Ni by’engebe, ni by’engebe, Ebinywa bya Yesu Kristo Ni by’engebe, ni by’engebe Ebinywa bya Yesu.

2. Kristo abiriha bose, Ebinywa eby’engebe, Akabirikira lino, Omundu w’ebibi Akakuha buyira, butsira erighula.

3. Engulu Yowene Yiwe, Ebinywa eby’engebe Bikaleta obuholo, Wamamwikiriya, Oghundi wangalamya, Sihali no mughuma.

string.name: number47
string.htmlData:
47. OKO MUSIKE W’E YORODANI
On Jordan’s Stormy Banks
CH 553-Doh is G

1. Indy’oko musike w’e Yordani, Nasumba ameso, Ndangir’ekihugho kye Kanani, Aho ho byaghe biri.

Erisuba mo :
Kihugho kibuya ky’obuholo, Yisiry’oko musike aboyire, Twasyimbira ho esyonyimbo sya Musa; Eribya na Yesu Kristo.

2. Eyisiry’oko mukokoro, Hali ekyakakala, Yesu Kristo asyaby’ekyakaka kyahighahw’ekiro.

3. Aho howene nasyahikey’ekiro kyahi kwehi, Nasyalangira Tat’omo meso, omo Bwami buwe.

4. Nyitsemire omo mutima, Sinyanzir’eryubaha, Yorodani ikahuha ndeke, Sindyubah’erisoka.

string.name: number48
string.htmlData:
48. HASYABY’OBUTSEME
O There’ll Be Joy
C.S. 553-Doh is C

1. Twasyatsem’emibiri yahwa, Abakaghesera Yesu, Bakandisyiky’emiheke, E Yerusalem’eyo.

Erisuba mo :
Butseme hasyaby’obutseme, Sibwesyahwa kera na kera. Obutseme buli hakuhi, Tuhindanir’ewetu.

2. Twasyatsema n’erimwimbira, Twasyabya tupipe Yesu, Rimusima, rimupipa, E Yérusalem’eyo.

3. Twasyatsemera yo kutsibu, Omo syonyumba nyibuya, Yesu abirikokotya E Yerusalem’eyo.

string.name: number49
string.htmlData:
49. EYO HAKUHI
One Sweetly Siemn Thought
CH 352-Doh is Bb

1. Namalengekania, Ewetu ni hakuhi, Namaseghera elubula, Ni hakuhi kutsibu.

Erisuba mo :
Eyo hakuhi ni hakuhi, Lino ndi hakuhi ye wetu; Nyinemwendihika yo.

2. Omo ngonde sya Tata, Hane yo esyonyumba Syabirihimbwa kera kera, Ew’Ababuyirire.

3. Nasyabya ndi hakuhi, Nasyikya emiheke, Nasyaluhuka omwaghalwa, Nambala erihenia.

string.name: number50
string.htmlData:
50. IRI EKIHUGHO KYOWENE
There Is A Land
CH 551-Doh is G

1. Iri ekihugho kwowene, Ekya Tata wetu Mubuya Anemukokotya ho wetu, Twasyasiba naye buholo.

Erisuba mo :
Twasyahika bolo, Oko Muyi wa Tata wetu, Twasyahindana yo, Oko Muyi mubuya kundu.

2. Twasyimba oko Muyi oyo, Esyonyimbo sya Yesu Kristo, Ahate n’obulighe buke, Kutse erilwala amakoni.

3. Wasingya ko Mukama Yesu, Oyo watuholera kera, Wasingya ko Mulamya wetu, Oyo watulusya kw’ebibi.

string.name: number51
string.htmlData:
51. TUBATISAYE
Baptize Us Anew
CH 525-Doh is Ab

1. Tubatisaye omo Kirimu, Mulamya as’eno, Tuhe Olwanzo.

Erisuba mo 1 :
Lino Mwami Yesu twakulakira, Muka Abuyirire, Tuhe olwanzo.

2. Tunemulaka, Tulame lino, Tughenyere kundu, Twitwa n’ebibi.

3. Muka wa Yesu, Twandaghalire, Tutsumule kundu, Tuh’Omuyisa.

4. Mulengy’uwene, Abugha ati: Uli Mwanga waghe, Nyanzire kundu.

Erisuba mo 2 :
Tunemukusima, N’erikupipa Tukakuh’ewasignya, Mwami: Amina.

string.name: number52
string.htmlData:
52. ASA SOKO Y’OMUYISA
Come Thou Fount
CH 291-Doh is Eb

1. Asa soko y’omuytisa, mb’omutima ng’usime, Esyonyusi esyituma, Twasyakupipa kundu. Nyighisaye, risyakupipa, Nyiminy’ihenia lyawe, Rikiriry’Obwami bwawe, Rikanyitsemesaya.

2. Nyisoghe mbye wawe kundu, Ndi ho busana nawe, Nyasi ko washanyitwala, Mbik’ewawe buholo. Yesu mwanzond’inyiherire, Nabya haly’omo bibi, Asonda ndame luholo, Mwatek’engebe Yiwe.

3. Ndi mo mwinda wawe Mwami, busana n’olukogho, Nyihire hakuhi nawe, nyiminy’olwanzo lwawe. Ndimbwe ko n’ebikandenga ko, Sinangakusighania: Imay’omutima waghe, Undinde ndame kundu.

string.name: number53
string.htmlData:
53. KIRIMU KIBUYIRIRE
Holy, Spirit, Faithfully Guide
CH 211-Doh is G

1. Kirimu Kibuyirire, Bya hakuhi n’Abakristo, Ngwaty’okuboko nzondole, Ndi mughendi w’emusitu. Abaluhire batseme, Bow’omulengy’owene, Abwira bo batah’imwe, Mwase ngabatwaly’ewenyu.

2. Siwendisyatuhemula, Sulighan’eriwatikya, Tubye ne erikirirya, Omo malighe tukwanze. Amalighe amahika, Emitima yubaha, Mulengy’ati: Batah’imwe: Mwase ngabatwaly’ewenyu.

3. Mibiri yetu yasyahwa, Twalindirir’érilama, Twibulaye ko tuliyo, Mo Bitabu by’elubula. Twisukul’ebikatebye, N’erikirirya Yesu, Mulengy’ati: Batah’imwe: Mwase ngabatwaly’ewenyu.

string.name: number54
string.htmlData:
54. HALY’EKYO NGASABA MWAMI
One Thing Of The Lord
CH 634-Doh is Bb

1. Haly’eko ngasaba, Mwami! Nomonangakola ebibi, Unyeraya, Unyeraye, Maghetsi, kuts’omuliro.

Erisuba mo :
Nyeribawe, kundu Mwami, N’omuliro wamasonda Ngus’ebibi, byaheribwa, Biheribwe, Biheribye.

2. Wamatunganany’obwenge, Nasyatsema n’erikupipa. Nikwa omutima ere, Alabire, Alabire.

3. Namer’omutima waghe, Niho mo nasyabya n’amenge, Ngangibawe, wawe Mwami: W’elubula, w’elubula.

4. Ngayiteghaya ko bibi, N’omo malangekania waghe, Mwami, n’ebyongola byosi, Sindi era, sindi era

string.name: number55
string.htmlData:
55. SULIWAHIKA KU YESU MULAMYA
Have You Been To Jesus?
CH 88-Doh is Ab

1. Suliwahika ku yesu Mulamya? Suliwaheny’omo musasi? Wabirikirirya erina liwe? Omutima wawe erine?

Erisuba mo :
Mutima erire, erire mo musasi wuwe, Wabirikirya ku Yesu Kristo, Werire mo musasi wuwe.

2. Unemuhangana mo nzira yiwe, Omutima wawe erire? Unemukwam’enzira ye Kalwari, Mukama abirilughula?

3. Unemusaba n’omuhwa munene, Omutima wawe erire? Unemutula Engulu Yowene, N’omutima wawe erire?

4. Unemulinda Omukama Yesu, N’omutima wawe erire? Wabirereka enzira y’ebibi, Omutima wawe erire?

string.name: number56
string.htmlData:
56. NATALIRE HALI KU YESU
I’ve Wandered Far Away
CH 560 - Doh is A

1. Natalire hali ku Yesu, Lino namasa, Nabiribulir’omo bibi, Lero namasa.

Erisuba mo :
Nyireke, nyireke, Namabitsira, Ntirighe unyibuyire, Mwami nyikokye.

2. Naherir’ebirimo bingi, Lino namasa, Namayireta nyilamaye, Lero namasa.

3. Nduhir’omo bibi n’eriwa, Lino namasa, Mbye n’amaha w’olwanzo lwawe, Lero namasa.

4. Yesu mwanyutir’omusasi, Lino namasa, Iyo wene wanganyilamya, Lero namasa.

5. Ow’engitsi yaghe nyilame, Lino namasa, Nyera Mwami mbye ng’amatwa, Lero namasa.

string.name: number57
string.htmlData:
57. OYO ANZIRE ASE
Whoseover Hearth?
Doh is D (Joyfully)

1. Yesu atwanzire kwilaba bose, Mwakwa oko muti n’eritulamya, Mwaheka ebibi by’abandu bosi, Ekyo ni kya wasingya.

Erisuba mo :
Oyo anzire, ase ku Yesu, Asyaban’engebe yo y’erikota; Oyo amawira, amakw’enyota, Angahika ku Yesu.

2. Birikir’abandu balwe kw’ebibi, Baleke enzira y’erisyahera, Bahike ku Yesu yo Mulamiya, Oyo anzire ase.

3. Neryo sinangalinda mulikyetu, Luyi lw’elubula lukingukere, Yesu ni nzira yo twangakwamire, Nawe wangingira mo.

string.name: number58
string.htmlData:
58. YO MWAMI WA BOSI
All Hail The Power
CH 156-Doh is G

1. S’inga Mwami w’Erikota , Bosi bakusabe, Mulet’embita y’Obwami buwe, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Mulet’embita y’Obwami buwe, Aby’Omwami w’abosi.

2. Mwe Banze be Israeli, Mwe bangu, mwe bake, Musabe Oyo wabalamaya, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Musabe Oyo wabalamaya, Aby’Omwami w’abosi.

3. Bihanda byosi by’ahisi, N’ebitunga byosi, Bosi babye banamusikirye, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Bosi babye banamusikirye, Kwali Yo Mwami w’abosi.

4. Lero tumwimbire kundu, Tumukukamire, Tumupipe ne erimusima, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Tumupipe ne erimusima, Kwali Yo Mwami w’abosi.

string.name: number59
string.htmlData:
59. YESU KRISTO ATWANZA
Jesus Lover Of My Soul
CH 401-Doh is F

1. Yesu Kristo watwanza, Uli Mulamya wetu, Sitani syatwanzire, Akatukola nabi, Yesu Kristo, twamasa, Oko wawe wowene, Utulamaye lino, N’omusasi owene.

2. Yesu Kristo Mulamya, Watusondire kera; Twamabya bandu babi, Utulusye kw’ebibi. Utubise ho ghu, Ahate n’obulighe, Situwite kaghala, Twamasa utuhe ko.

3. Engebe y’erikota, Yikalwa oko wawe, Utusulaye lino, N’omutima mubuya. Yesu twamakukwama, Utukangaye ndeke, Twamalek’ekihugho, Tukwanze biro byosi.

4. Mukama mo wanyerya, No omusasi wawe, No olukogho lwawe, Lukabanika kuwe. Kuwe Mwami ngasunga, Engebe y’erikota, Omo mutima waghe, Mukama unyusule.

string.name: number60
string.htmlData:
60. YESU TUTSEMESAYE
Jesus, Thou Joy Of Loving Heart
CH 154-Doh is A

1. Yesu tutsemesye itwe, Soko y’engebe kyakakala ky’abandu, Eritsema lyosi ly’ashisi, Tulitsire n’erikukwamirira.

2. Obundu bw’engebe niwe, Tusond’erighulwa nawe biro byosi, Soko mbuya ityuma kundu, Tubugh’enyota mo mitima yetu.

3. Omuluhi lwetu lungi, Tuyitsutse iwe Mwami wetu Mwenge, Wamasika kikutu-kutu, N’obutseme bwetu tuli haghuma.

4. Yesu bya haghuma netu, Tuh’obuholo, tutseme biro byosi, Tulamye kw’ebibi byatimba, Kolery’ekyakakala mo kihugho.

string.name: number61
string.htmlData:
61. KANDI EKINYWA KYA YESU
More About Jesus
C.S. 525-Doh is Ab

1. Kandi ekinywa kya Yesu, Ingye nyanzire eryowa, Mwaya ho nangakwirira, Mowa amalighe waghe.

Erisuba mo :
Akandi olwanzo, Olwanzo lwa Yesu; Ngandibwira Mulekyetu, y’erighenyera ry’Omwami.

2. Kandi ekinywa kya Yesu, Ekyo kyalwa elubula, Ekikaka ng’oluseke, Omo nzira yaghe yosi.

3. Kandi tupip’Omukama, oyo wasa erilamya, Oyo wasyaswasa kandi, Eribohol’ekihugho.

4. Nyanzir’erikala naye, N’erikania naye kundu, Nyitoke eribakangya, Kwali Mwami gh’obuholo.

string.name: number62
string.htmlData:
62. YESU NYIKWANZIRE
My Jesus I Love Thee
CH 276-Doh is F

1. Yesu nyikwanzire kundu, Namayiha; Mitsye mibi yosi, Ngaghana eyosi. Niwe Mulamya waghe, Mubuya ngw’ikirirye, Sinyiritakwanza nga, Lino Nyamuhanga.

2. Nyikwanzire niwe watsuk’erinyanza; Wabirinyighul’oko muti Kalwari. Nyikwanzire, Iwe wanyambalira amahwa, Sinyiritakwanza nga, Lino Mwami Yesu.

3. Nyikwanzire erihika okwihola, Nasyabya ngapipa nyinemuhumula. N’omughulu w’erihola lyaghe nasyabugha: Sinyiritakwanza nga, Lino Mwami Yesu.

4. Nasyahik’ewawe wabirikokotya, Nasyakupipira yo, Ebiro byosi. Nasyakupipa nambal’akakira kabuya; Sinyiritakwanza nga, Lino Nyamuhanga.

string.name: number63
string.htmlData:
63. NINDI ANGATULAMYA
What Can Wash Away My Sin?
C.S. 93-Doh is G

1. Nindi angatulamya, Nina Yesu Iyo wene, Niki kyokyangatwerya, Gh’ono musasi wa Yesu.

Erisuba mo :
Wamatuwaniya, Yesu Omulamya; Twabirikiriya, Oko Musasi wa Yesu.

2. Alihire ebibi, Gh’ono musasi wa Yesu, Amalusy’olubanza, Gh’ono Musasi wa Yesu.

3. Wangahika hakuhi, Oko Musasi wa Yesu, Eyindi nzira siri, Gh’ono Musasi wa Yesu.

4. Ni nzira y’Omulamya, Itwe twangamukwamire, Atughulire nagho, Gh’ono Musasi wa Yesu.

5. Akinda ekihugho, Omusasi wawe Yesu, Asyatukoly’endata, Omusasi wawe Yesu.

string.name: number64
string.htmlData:
64. UKALUHA? UBWIRE YESU
Are You Weary? Tell It To Jesu
C.S. 515-Doh is Bb

1. Ukaluha emwisi w’ebibi, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Obulighe bwamakuhika ko? Ubwire Yesu byosi.

Erisuba mo :
Ubwire Yesu, ubwire Yesu, Iye ni Mwira kundu; Siwendisyaban’oghundi nga Ye, Ubwire Yesu byosi.

2. Mbino ukatebibwa n’abandu, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Wamubaha ebinywa by’abandi, Ubwire Yesu Kristo.

3. Wamasagha eryendereribwa, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Yesu akandikuh’obutsema, Umubwire ebyosi.

4. Wamabya ukubah’oluholo, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Wamamwikirirya n’omutima, Akandisyakulamya.

string.name: number65
string.htmlData:
65. KA LYOWENE KUNDU-KUNDU
Tis So Sweet To Trust
C.S. 588-Doh is Bb

1. Ka lyowene kundu-kundu, Wamikiriya Yesu. Wamikiriry’emibughe, Niyo Mulamya wetu.

Erisuba mo :
Yesu, Yesu namabyanza, Nabirikwanza kundu, Yesu, Yesu ka ni Mwira, Namakusima lino.

2. Ka lyowene kundu-kundu, Wamaleka ebibi. Wamabana esyongebe, N’obutseme kwenene.

3. Ka lyowene kundu-kundu, Wamaminya Ye Kristo. Wamaminya kwasikala, Haghuma netu eno.

4. Nyitsemire n’erikwama, N’erikukukamira. Yesu mwanza, mwasakana, Ubye naghe Mukama.

string.name: number66
string.htmlData:
66. NATSEMIRE KIRO EKYO
O Happy Day
C.S. 399-Doh is G

1. Natsemire kiro ekyo, Nikiriray’Omulamya. Mwanyilusya kw’amalolo, Mwanyerya kw’ebibi byosi.

Erisuba mo :
Tutseme, tutseme, Yesu mwatwera kw’ebibi. Mwatukangya erisaba, N’eritsema biro byosi, Tutseme, tutseme, Yesu mwatwera kw’ebibi.

2. Sihali ghundi Mulamya, Nina Yesu Iyo wene. Ni Mubuya, amatoka, Amalusya olubanza.

3. Abiririha ebibi, Abirkind’oluholo. Mwalubuka omw’isinda, Abirikinda Sitani.

string.name: number67
string.htmlData:
67. ABANZIRWE N’OMWAMI
Come We That Love The Lord
CH 640-Doh is G

1. Abanzirwa n’Omwami, Ni mwase tuyatule, Hosi eritsema lyetu, Tusumb’émirenge yetu, Tutimb’ékitumbi, Tutimb’ékitumbi.

Erisuba mo :
Tughend’e Sayuni, Omuyi owene kundu. Tughend’e Sayuni ko muy’owene wa Nyamuhnga.

2. Tuleke abaponi, Bakaghana Omwami. Nikwa abana b’Omwami, Nikwa abana b’Omwami, Mubye mukasima, Mubye mukasima.

3. Tutsemer’e Sayunu, Muyi abuyirire. Twasyahindana yo bosi, Twasyahindana yo bosi, Hasyaby’obuholo, Hasyaby’obuholo.

4. Twimbiry’omo kigugho, Sihabye ukalira, Twamayahika ewetu, Twamayahika ewetu, Kihugho kibuya, Kihugho kibuya.

string.name: number68
string.htmlData:
68. NDAMIBAWE
Redeemed How I Love...
CH 635-Doh is A

1. Naghulw’omusasi w’Embuli, Monalam’omwighenyera, Lino ndi mwana wawe kundu, Nasyatula gho ehosi.

Erisuba mo :
Ndamibawe, n’omusasi wawe Yesu, Nyeraye, Nyeraye, Ndi mwana wawe kwenene.

2. Nyipipe Yesu wanyilamya, Nyinemutsema kutsibu, Niwe kyakakala kibuya, Unzondol’ebiro byosi.

3. Sinyibiriraw’Omulamya, Nyinemukulengekania, Sindiluha erimusima, Ngapipa olwanzo luwe.

4. Nyasi ko nasyamulola ko, Nasyatsemera ewuwe, Akandinda ndeke ehosi, Mumusibire n’erimba.

5. Ndi n’amaha kwambikire ho, Kakira omo lubula, Lero twasyabya naye kundu, N’abamwikirirye bosi.

string.name: number69
string.htmlData:
69. TWASYAPOLYA KO AW’ENGEBE
We’ll Tarry By The Living Waters
C.S. 206-Doh is Eb

1. Twasyapolya oko w’engebe, Isoko nyibuya, Aho Yesu asyatulinda, Hindana lyowene.

Erisuba mo :
Twasyapolya oko w’engebe, Twasyapolya oko w’engebe. Twasyapolya oko w’engebe, Twasyasib’okw’isoko.

2. Twamaluhibwa n’emibiri, Tuluhuke eyo, Ko maghetsi asongokwere, Kw’isoko nyibuya.

3. Tughende k’Omukama Kristo, Atuh’érilama, Kandi tuminye kw’akalamya, Tunywe enyot’ihwe.

string.name: number70
string.htmlData:
70. MUGHULU YESU ASYAHINDANIA AMAMI
When Jesus Shall Gather Kingdoms
CH 538-Doh is F

1. Mughulu Yesu syahindany’Amami, Bahangan’embere siwe; Itwe twasyabya tuti omo mbanza, Kiro ky’eriyateghekwa.

Erisuba mo :
Asyahunik’engan’omo kighona, Neryo omusung’asyaghuswa. Itwe twasyabya tuti omo mbanza, Sy’ekiro ky’erilubuka.

2. Ndindy’asyow’Omulamya abugh’ati: Uli mughombe mubuya, Kutse asyakwa buba abwirw’ambu: Lwa ho, ghenda sinyikwasi.

3. Tuteghaye tulindiriry’Omwami, N’esiseke sinemwaka, Omukwe eghaye itunemuteya, Twe bosi abana buwe.

4. Tubye tukaghaniry’eby’elubula, Olughendo lwasyahwa ho, Twasyahangana embere sy’Omwami, Twamatendisub’enyuma.

string.name: number71
string.htmlData:
71. NZAKIRWE MO KWEHI?
Is My Name Written There?
CH 617-Doh is Ab

1. Sindikwa engitsi y’efeza n’ezahabu, Nyanzir’eby’elubula, Nyibye n’ababuya. Yesu Mulamya mbwira: Ekitabu kiwe, Kundu ky’Obwami buwe: Nzakirwe mo kwehi?

Erisuba mo :
Nzakirwe mo kwehi, Kitabu Kibuya, Mo Kitabu ky’Obwami: Nzakirwe mo kwehi.

2. Ebibi byaghe Mwami, Bingi ko museghe, Asa, Mwami, Nyeraye mo musasi wawe. Wabirilaghana kw’ebibi byetu byosi, Byamasos’omunyama, Wasyeryabyo kundu.

3. Omo Muyi Mubuya, N’enyumba nyibuya, N’ababuya bane mo, Bambity’obubuya. N’ebibi sibiri yo, By’eribihya eyo, Ho hali obuholo, Nzakirwe mo kwehi.

string.name: number72
string.htmlData:
72. HALI OLUBANZA
The Judgment Has Set
CH 482-Doh is Ab

1. Haly’olubanza binemutondolwa, Twasyayira tuti kwehi? Twahik’emuliro gh’Omutsweri, Aban’ebyo twakola byosi.

Erisuba mo :
Twasyayira tuty’ekirw’ekyo? Twasyayira tuty’ekirw’ekyo? Twasyabya tunemuteya kwehi? Kutse twasyakindwa n’ebibi?.

2. Syabiritsuk’omo babirihola, Syasyasa n’omo bali ho, Twasyaleberibw’omo Masako, Ayo ni mulangiri wetu.

3. Twasyabugha tuti eky’omo mbanza, Ebitabu byasanzulwa; Mundu mundu abwiraw’ebiwe, Atawite omutongolya.

string.name: number73
string.htmlData:
73. OMWAMI AKABIRIKIRA
Called To The Feast
CH 537-Doh is Eb

1. Omwami akabirikira, Atuhindanaye n’abuwe; Asyatweya ituli tuti: Ahw’asyasira.

Erisuba mo :
Mwana wa Tata we Asa, Nikw’Omwamy’asyasa, Twasyayira tuti kwehi? Omwami asa.

2. Twasyambalibwa asyombita, Omutongolya asingibwa, Twasyabya naye n’erikota, Ahw’asyasira.

3. Ngokw’eripalya asyaswasa, Nikwa asyakangya ebyosi; Asyakangy’ebyosi twakola, Ahw’asyasira.

4. Asyatsemer’Abana buwe, Bambal’embita yihenirye; Twamakinda twasyatsema yo, Ahw’asyasira.

5. Sitwendisyasighana kandi, Abaghan’erimwowa bosi; Basyalaka n’erisyalira, Ahw’asyasira.

6. Mwami tuli n’amaha wawe, Twighisy’erikulindirira; Sitwesyubaha twalangira, Kiro wasyasa.

string.name: number74
string.htmlData:
74. BIBA OMO NGYAKYA
Sowing In The Morning
CH 621-Doh is C

1. Biba omo ngyakya, Embuto syowene; Ubibe mwitungi hik’omwigholo. Lindirira syere, N”erighesa lyahwa, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.

Erisuba mo :
Mulety’engano, Mulety’engano, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano Mulety’engano, Mulety’engano, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.

2. Bib’eryuba ryasa, Biba n’omo mbeho, Susagh’ekilumbi n’embeho nyingi. Erighesa ryahwa, n’emibiri yahwa, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.

3. Twende tukalira, Tubibiry’Omwami; Twamabya n’obulighe bw’abahera. Kiro twasyakiranibwa n’Omukama, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.

string.name: number75
string.htmlData:
75. OMULENGE GH’OMULISYA
Hark Tis The Shepherd’s Voice
CH 625-Doh is Ab

1. Omulenge gh’Omulisya, Akabirikira Eka; Kw’esyombuli syaherire, Mo buhyo ni ho syalwire.

Erisuba mo :
Ni mwase, ni mwase, Tusisonday’omo musitu, Ni mwase, ni mwase, Tusisubaye ku Yesu.

2. Tutabale Omulisya, Tusondaye esyatere, Tusisubay’omo buhyo, Ho syangabalir’émbeho.

3. Syamamir’omo musitu, Syamahika omo ngwangwa; Omwamy’akababwir’ati: Musond’esyombuli syaghe.

string.name: number76
string.htmlData:
76. LAMYA AB’EBIBI
Rescue The Perishing
CH 623-Doh is Bb

1. Lamya ab’ebibi, lamy’abakoni ; Balusy’obulighe n’oluholo. Habul’abatere, Sumb’abawire, Babwire ko Yesu akalamya.

Erisuba mo :
Lamya ab’ebibi, lamy’abakoni Yesu Mughenyeri, Akalamya.

2. Bamusekererya, Syalibaghana, Akalinda abatabuke. Bakune batsire, Ubasabire; Mo malighe asyababuyira.

3. Kung’abaherire, Munasesene ; Balek’engumbu y’ebitowene; Basule olwanzo, Bakole ndeke, Basub’oko Muhangiki wabo.

4. Lamya ab’ebibi, Bikutolere; Omwami asyakuh’akaghala, Usondol’abosi Mo nzira nyike, Minyisy’enduli kwa syalamibwa.

string.name: number77
string.htmlData:
77. INGYE NYANZIRE ENGULU
I Love To Telle The Story
CH 518-Doh is Ab

1. Ingye nyanzire Engulu, Yo ya Yesu Mukama; Eritula omwatsi, ghoyo wahol’oko muti. Ghoyo waly’omwisinda, Ghoyo kandisyahika, N’eritutwal’ewuwe, Aherihenia.

Erisuba mo :
Ingye nangatula gho, oko bihanda byosi, Olwanzo lwa Yesu Kristo, Mwami Oyo wetu.

2. Ingye nyanziry’omubiri, wa Yesu we Kalwari, Kusangwa mwanyilusya k’olubanza w’erihera. N’eririha ebibi, mwanyitongolya kundu, N’ekyo kyokyangatuma: Inamukolera.

3. Ingye nyanzir’éritula, Omwatsi gho’omusasi ; N’esyodudy’omo byala, N’eritum’omo lukanga. Mobyaghaly’Omukama, Oyo Mubuyirire, Kusangwa atwanzire, Wasingy’oku Yesu.

4. Ingye nyanzire Kitabu, Eky’Omukama Yesu; Kikanyibwir’Omwatsi, Y’obuholo bw’egh’Omwami. Kikanyibwir’Omwatsi, w’engebe y’erikota; Ilabire emyatsi yosi y’ekihugho.

string.name: number78
string.htmlData:
78. TULAMAYE ABAHERIRE
Seeking The Lost
CH 532-Doh is Eb

1. Neryo tulamaye abatere; Abatere hali ku Yesu. Tubahindule mo Ngulu Yiwe, Baminye k’Omwamy’abanzire.

Erisuba mo :
Tuye hosi (Tuye hosi) Tweghay’abandu bosi, Tuletere (Tuletere) Yesu baherire. Tuby’omo buhyo (Tuby’omo buhyo) By’Omulamya wetu Yesu wayiha oko b’ebibi.

2. Tuletere Yesu abatere, Abolo bate n’akaghala. Bakangay’aho basyalamira, Baminye enzira y’Engebe.

3. Tughende ngoko Yes(u) atutuma, Tubye tunemumukolera. Lamy’abakoni, Sumb’abawire, Sondol’abatere ku Yesu.

string.name: number79
string.htmlData:
79. AMALIMA ERIRE
Far And Near The Field
CH 448-Doh is F

1. Amalima erire ehosi ni ndambi y’erihulula, Lino ni ndambi y’erihulula Mukokoro n’oko bitwa.

Erisuba mo :
Mwami utume abaghesi tulame Mwami w’erikota, Batume bahindanay’amulo; Omughulu akine ho.

2. Ubatume omo ngyakya-ngyakya, Utume bo n’omw’itungi, N’endambi y’eryuba n’erirenga, Bahamule bayaghese.

3. Mughombe gh’Omwami, Yir’omuhwa hindanay’eby’erigheswa, Nerw’ekiro wasyabugh’ebyosi, Wasyatsemer’elubula.

string.name: number80
string.htmlData:
80. TUKOLE
To The Work
CH 576-Doh is F

1. Tukole n’omuhwa, tukolere Yesu, Tughende tukolere Omwami wetu; Kinywa kiwe ky’okikatuh’akaghala, Tuyiry’omuhwa mungi twikiriraye.

Erisuba mo :
Tukole, tukole, tukole, tukole, Tuminye, tusike, tulindirire Omwami,

2. Tukole n’omuhwa, lamy’abawirire, Sondol’abaluhire ah’erilama, N’erikangirirya Engulu Yowene, Tuyihalambire oko Musalaba.

3. Tukole n’omuhwa, Tuyabwir’abosi, Ko amami wa hisi akandisyahwa, Kandi Omwami asyapipwa n’abosi, Ababuya basyimbira erilama.

4. Tukole n’omuhwa, Omwamy’ase luba, Ekiro ky’erighesa kyamabihika. Tuy’elubula ew’ababirilama, Twasyabya n’erimba ko twabirilama.

string.name: number81
string.htmlData:
81. KOL’OMUBIRI WAWE
Work For the Night Is Coming
CH 446-Doh is F

1. Kol’omubiri wawe, Bukinalolire; Kola hakin’ekimi, Subye mughata. Kola bukiri mw’itungu, S’uluhe na hake, Kol’omubiri wawe, Bugh’emibiri.

2. Kol’omubiri wawe, Kola n’omw’itungi; Kola ebiro byosi, Sighuluhuke. Omo ndambi ukiriho, Uyitsingirire, Ukole bute bwira, Bugh’emibiri.

3. Kol’omubiri wawe, Lino bulolire; Bukasonda erira, Tayira luba. Erihika n’omo kiro, Eryuba ryalenga, Uyitsing’erikola, Bugh’emibiri.

string.name: number82
string.htmlData:
82. OMO NGYAKYA Lord,
In The Morning
CH 39-Doh is F

1. Omo ngyakya nyinemwimba, Nyikupipe Mwami, Nguhe erisaba lyaghe, Mwami ngwikirirye.

2. Mwami unzondole kundu, Mo nzira nyibuya, Unyiminyisay’obwenge, Miny’ebitolere.

3. Bakakeng’Erina lyawe, Ubye ukowa bo, Ubaswike olukogho, Balamy’amalighe.

string.name: number83
string.htmlData:
83. MUKENG’ERINA LY’OMWAMI
O For Thousand Tongues
CH 155-Doh is A

1. Mwase tupipe Omwamo tuti: Erina lyawe rikengwe, Mwami ni We w’erihenia lyosi, Erina lyawe rikengwe.

Erisuba mo :
Mukeng’Erina, Mukeng’Erina, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami, Mukeng’Erina, Mukeng’Erina, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.

2. Yesu Rina, rikabugh’obuba, Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami, Mweny’ebibi ngamukwama lino, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.

3. Atulamya kaghala k’ebibi, Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami, Omusasi wawe atulamya, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.

4. Mulenge wuwe mubuya kundu, Mukeng’Erin ly’Omwami, Abandu bosi babughe bati : Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami.

5. Esyondimi syosi syimbe siti: Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami, Yesu Kristo Yowatuholera, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.

string.name: number84
string.htmlData:
84. TUPIPY’OMWAMI NI MWENGE
Praise God From Whom
CH 683-Doh is G

1. Tupipy’Omwami ni Mwenge, Tumupipa bandu bosi, Mumupipe Abalaika. Isse, Mwana n’Ekirumu. Amina

string.name: number85
string.htmlData:
85. NYIPIPIRE NYAMUHANGA
I Sing The Mighty Power
CH 93-Doh is Eb

1. Nyipipire Nyamuhanga wahangik’ebitwa, Yowasesa esyongetsi, Mwahangik’ekyanya. Nyipipy’oyo wah’eryuba, Eryaka omwitungi, Yowahira omukera, N’engununu syosi.

2. Mbipy’olukogho lw’Omwami, Wasulay’akalyo Mwahangik’omo kinyw’ekyo, Ebirihw’ebyosi. Eby’eriswekera byawe, Ngalangira ehosi, Hano hisi n’elubula, Esyo ndambi syosi.

3. Sihali kike n’ekike, Kitetukangaya, Embula n’eryuba biry’okwitegheka lyawe. Ukah’ebiri h’omuka, Kand’ukatung’ebyosi, Situsaghe Nyamuhanga, Lero aly’ehosi.

string.name: number86
string.htmlData:
86. TUPIPE OMWAMI
O Worship The King
CH 75-Doh is A

1. Tupipe Omwami w’ekihugho, Na kandi mwimbe, Tumusime Yesu. Akatulembera, Akatubika; Netu twamusaba, N’erih’ewasignya.

2. Tubwir’abandu, Emyatsi yiwe, Sitwangaluha, Akaha akaghala. Iye ni Munene, Akatabala, Mwah’engebe Yiwe, Erilamy’abandu.

3. Awity’amaka, Kwilab’abosi, Lwanzo lwa Yesu, Lwalet’obuholo. Abirituyira mo bana buwe ; Ng’abaghala buwe, Twangamukolera.

string.name: number87
string.htmlData:
87. TATA TWAS’AH’ULI
Father, We Come To Thee
CH 599-Doh is F

1. Tata twas’ah’uli, Tutawity’oghundi, Niw’ukatulamya, Tutsumule, Twabya tutesiba, Tuly’omo malighe, Utuluhukaye, Tata Mwenge.

Erisuba mo :
Tata twas’ah’uli, S’utughane, Wasi erilamya, Towe lino.

2. Tulusy’ekw’enzighu, Tulamy’obulighe, Utuhumulay’omo malighe, Situwity’amaka, Tusul’akaghala, Utuhe amak’imotwakinda.

3. Tusule olwanzo, Tuby’abawe kundu, Tusondol’ewawe, Twase kuwe, Tubye nawe Mwami, Nomo twangahola, Sitwibirirawe tubye nawe.

string.name: number88
string.htmlData:
88. SUNYILABE KO
Pass Me Not
CH 599 Doh is Ab

1. S’unyilabe ko Mulamya, We ngayitsutsa, Wamalenderer’abandi, Naghe s’unzighe.

Erisuba mo :
Uwe Mulamya, We ngayitsutsa, Wamalenderer’abandi, Naghe s’unzighe.

2. Mbye hakuhi nawe Mwami, Mban’ighenyera, Namakukwama ngenyere, Mb’erikirirya.

3. Sihali ghundi Mulamya, Niwe wowene, Ndamy’ebihutale byaghe, Unyighenyere.

4. Ul’Isoko y’obuholo, Mwenye engebe, Singwity’oghundi Mulamya, Ni nawe Yesu.

string.name: number89
string.htmlData:
89. NDAMBI MBUYA Y’ERISABA
Sweet Hour Of Prayer
CH 316-Doh is D

1. Ndambi mbuya y’erisaba, Ikanyilusy’omo malighe; Mbu nyasy’aho Tata ali, Nyimubwire obwera bwaghe. Mo syo ndambi sy’obulighe, Nasungire akaghala, Ngind’eryaghalwa ly’enzighu, Mo ndambi mbuya y’erisaba.

2. Ndambi mbuya y’erisaba, Ukalay’erisaba lyaghe; Omwami syalihemuka, Akatulinda tutsumulwe. Namayiha kwiye lino, Nikwa yowambirikira, Nyine n’amaha w’ewuwe, Nyipip’endambi y’erisaba.

3. Ndambi mbuya y’erisaba, Ubye ukanyihumulaya; Nikwa nasyahik’ewetu, Nasyahuluka omo bitu. Mba bw’isimi n’ababuya, N’eyo ngebe y’erikota, Aho ni ho nasyalagha, Endambi mbuya y’erisaba.

string.name: number90
string.htmlData:
90. EBIRO NDATU BYAMAHWA
Another Six Day’s Work
CH 448-Doh is F

1. Ebiro ndatu byamahwa, Yindi Sabato yatsuka, Nzemire eriluhuka, Mo kiro kyatsumulaa.

2. Mwase tupipe Omwami, Yowatuh’eriluhuka, Omuyisa w’ekirw’ekyo, Alabir’eyindi yosi.

3. Tutsemiry’omo mitima, Twitsingir’eby’elubula, Mo buluhukiro bwetu, Ko Mwami Mwenye Sabato.

4. Eryombomba ry’elubula, Ritusule itwe bosi, Hosi Kanisa y’Omwami, Ikind’esyongumbu nyibi.

string.name: number91
string.htmlData:
91. YITSINGE, USABE
Watch for The Time Is Short
C.S. 555-Doh is F

1. Sighuluhe omughul’ono, Teghaya ni muhindo, Teya sukindwe n’ebya hisi, Mukristo usabe. Wasy’omubiri ni molo! Kandy’enzighw’ikalire, Ulindiriry’Omuheruki, Teghaya sighumbaye.

Erisuba mo :
Yitsinge Usabe, Yitsinge Usabe, Uyiteghay’omwitungi n’omo kiro: Sighumbay’erisaba.

2. Higha ebikakulenga ko, Lek’emitima mingi, Wasyaluhukir’elubula, Ho wasyombombera. Uby’ukasba Mukristo, Omwami akwanzire, Ibuka kw’akuholera, Bamulusy’omusasi.

3. Sighumbay’erisaba Yesu, Bya Naye ndambi syosi, S’umwibirirawe na hake, Lindirir’Omwami. S’ulind’isyatitimbira, Lek’eritika-tika, Ni ndambi y’érimulinda, Sighumbay’erisaba.

string.name: number92
string.htmlData:
92. WIBUKE SABATO
Don’t Forget The Sabbath
C.S. 653-Doh is C

1. Wibuke Sabato, Omwami atsumula, Ni kikul’omo bindi, Kilabir’ebyosi. Tukaluhuk’emibiri, Twabwirw’eby’elubula, Ni luseke lukaka, Lwalwa ku Nyamuhanga.

Erisuba mo :
Utuletery’obuholo, Sabato mbuya kundu, Utuletery’obuholo Sabato mbuya.

2. Weraye Sabato, Kandi upip’Omwami, Wabwir’abaghomby’ati: Ingye Ndi “Engebe”, Twamayibombeka lino, Tukolery’Omulamya, Twasyatwaly’okw’isoko, Y’amaghetsi w’engebe.

3. Tutsemire kundu, Tunemwimbira Yesu, Mwira Wetu Mubuya, Tumuyiketere. Mulamya wetu Mubuya, Erighenyera ryawe, Indi haghuma nenyu, Rikamba Omuyisa.

string.name: number93
string.htmlData:
93. KIRO KY’ERILUHUKA
O Day Of Rest And Gladness
CH 463-Doh is F

1. Kiro kyowene ky’eriluhuka, Kyatsumulawa ky’obuholo. Kikasubaya utakalire, Kyowene omo bindi byosi, Mwami mo kiro kyawe, Abosi bakupipe, Tupipe lino kundu, Ni w’erikota n’erikota.

2. Ni kisokero kitesendaya, Sikiribya mo emighumba, Kiri ng’éririma eryowene, Esyonyusi sya ho syowene. Ni maghetsi w’amuhu, Omoghulu w’embeho Ni ho tukabanira, Ekihugho eky’endaghane.

3. Ni kiro kikalet’omuyisa, N’erituletera Olwanzo, Kyokikalek’itwatsir’ebyosi, Erikwama eby’elubula. Kiro ky’erighenyera, Kiro eki kibuya Tusond’eriluhuka, N’omo ngonde sy’omo lubula.

string.name: number94
string.htmlData:
94. ERIHINDANA LY’E SABATO
Sweet Sabbath School
C.S. 608-Doh is Ab

1. Erihindana lye Sabato, Erigh’ekinywa kiwe, Erihindana ribuya kundu, Likanzemesaya.

Erisuba mo :
Hindana lye Sabato, Hindana lye Sabato, Nyanzire ry’omo mutima waghe, Hindana lye Sabato.

2. Omutima waghe atsemire, Erimuminya kundu, Kikanyisondola omo ngebe, Hindana lye Sabato.

3. Hindan’eryo Yesu atsumula, Kandi mwanyibuyira, Omulenge wuwe ogh’olwanzo, Hindana lye Sabato.

string.name: number95
string.htmlData:
95. EBIRO NDATU BYAHWERE
Safely Through Another Week
CH 462-Doh is G

1. Biro ndatu byahwere, Twabwirawa n’Omwami; Tusonde Omuyisa, Mo Kisabiro kyawe. Ni kiro kilabire, Kyanyibuky’elubula, Ni kiro kilabire, Kyanyibuky’elubula.

2. Tukasab’omuyisa, Mo rina ry’Omulamya, Tubughire ebibi, Utughenyere kundu. Tuleke ebya hisi, Itwaluhuka nawe, Tuleke ebya hisi, Uluhukire omw’itwe.

3. Twamas’erikupipa, Iwas’itwasangana, Tukweghaye Mulamya, Mo Kisabiro kyawe. Mwami tuhe muyisa, Bibuya by’elubula, Mwami tuhe muyisa, Oko byasyaby’elubula.

4. Engulu yawe mbuya, Ikalamya ababi, Erighenyera lyawe, Likatulekeraya. Tuhe erikusima, Twanze Sabato yawe, Tuhe erikusima, Tubye nawe biro byosi.

string.name: number96
string.htmlData:
96. TWAMAKUKOKYA KANDI
Welcome, Welcome,
CH 459-Doh is G

1. Twamakukokya kandi, Ebiro by’obutseme, Mweyo wakabukaya, Kyakakala ky’endata.

2. Butseme bwawe kundu, Ibwatsemesy’omweyo, Bahumuly’obulighe, N’eribugh’olughendo.

3. Kiro kibuyirire, Ky’eripip’omwisaba, Na atuminyisaye, Muyisa wawe mungi.

4. Twamakukokya kandi, Kiro ky’eriluhuka, Wase n’amaka wawe, Omo mutima waghe.

string.name: number97
string.htmlData:
97. MOTOW’ENGULU MBUYA
We Have Heard
CH 637-Doh is G

1. Motow’Engulu Mbuya, Ko Yesu alamya, Tsungania obutseme, Ko Yesu alamya. Bibwir’abandu bosi, Usoke n’esyonyusi, Omwamy’ati ya hosi, Ni Yesu alamya.

2. Tsungania n’oko ngesti, Ko Yesu alamya, Ubwire ab’ebibi, Ko Yesu alamya. Tsungania n’ebitsira, Kw’Engulu Yowene nga, Yasyowibwa ehosi, Ko Yesu alamya.

3. N’omo malwiro muti : Ni Yesu alamya, Mwatutongolya itwe, Ni Yesu alamya. Abalwere mwimbire, Basonde Omulamya, Mwimbiry’oko masinda, Ko Yesu alamya.

4. Amahung’abugh’ati: Ni Yesu alamya, Bandu bosi basime, Ko Yesu alamya. Sumb’omulenge uti, Mwase bosi mulame, Tupipe Ow’Amaka, Ko Yesu alamya.

string.name: number98
string.htmlData:
98. NYIKWANZIRE WE MULAMYA
I Must Have The Saviour With Me
CH 541-Doh is C

1. Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Sinangayighendera, Nyikwanzire mbye hakuhi, Unyihe n’akaghala.

Erisuba mo :
Sinangubah’ekindu,Umbwir’ebyo wanzire, Sihali kyangagha h’uli: Ngukwamirir’ehosi.

2. Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Ko ndi molo kutsibu, Ni Nawe ukanzikaya, Singwite no oghundi.

3. Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Aho ndi mo kihugho, Mo mulumbi n’oko ryuba, N’omo malighe ghosi.

4. Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Mbwire eby’ekwenene, Ungolay’oko Yordani, Umbe n’erisoka yo!

string.name: number99
string.htmlData:
99. NAMIBUK’OMUSALABA
When I Survey The Wondrous Cross
CH 120-Doh is Eb

1. Namibuk’omusalaba w’eriswekya, Omwami w’erihenia mwahola kugho. Esyondundi syaghe, Sindiswibuka syo kandi N’ebyongayipipa mo kundu.

2. Lebay’esyongolu syo mubiri waghe, Sikandeter’obulighe n’obutseme. Akandy’obulighe n’obutseme byahindana Hali akakira k’amahwa.

3. Nabya nabiritala nyiring’ekyusa, Neryo nabirilama omo malihge. Sunzighanaye sinyiyipip’omo kindi, Nikwa omusalaba wawe.

4. Naho ebyabumbawa byabya ebyaghe, Sinangabana ekyo nakulenga ko. N’olwanzo n’obwenge bwalwa elubula, Bikaleka inasigh’ebyosi.

string.name: number100
string.htmlData:
100. ITWE TWAMABAN’OMWIRA
What A Friend We Have In Jesus
CH 320-Doh is F

1. Itwe twamabon’Omwira, Yesu Kristo Mulamya, Mwaheka ebibi byatu, Amatuh’obutseme. Twangamusab’akaghala, Asy’amalighe wetu, Ni Mulamya Mwenge kundu, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira.

2. Twabya tuli n’omulighe, N’enzir’eyikalire, Yesu akanditulamya, N’akaghala kanene. Sitwangaluha na hake, Akandituwatikya, Tumusabe biro byosi, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira.

3. Sitani akatutebya, Na tukakwa endwala, Yesu syangatwibirirwa, Tumusabe kwenene. Yesu mwakinda Sitani, Netu twangakinda yo, Tusikay’Omwami wetu, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira.

4. Mwami mwakola kibuya, Mwatum’Omwana wuwe, Ritulamya kwe Sitani, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira. Twasyasoker’ewa Tata, Ahate n’obulighe, Tumutwalire abandu, bangabya Bana buwe.

string.name: number101
string.htmlData:
101. YESU KRISTO AKABIRIKIRA
Jesus Is Calling
CH 569-Doh is C

1. Yesu Kristo akabirikira, Wase lino, wase lino, Neryo sughend’omo yindi nzira, Wase ukwame Yesu.

Erisuba mo :
Wase kwiye, wase kweiye, Yesu akabirikira uhike kwiye.

2. Abaluhire basyaluhuka, Wase lino, wase lino, Ab’emiheke yiritohire, Baban’eriluhuka.

3. Anemulinda abandu bosi, Base lino, Base lino, We wahalaya sighuyibise, Wase ulamibawe.

4. Yesu akalind’abakaghana, Base lino, base lino, Basyatsema bamamwikirirya, Babuka luba, base!

string.name: number102
string.htmlData:
102. OMO LUKYO L’OMWEYO
Let Him In
CH 566-Doh is Db

1. Omo lukyo l’omweyo, Mugheni (Anahangene), Anahangene aho, Mugheni (Anahangene). Neryo umukokaye, Ukokaye Omwana Wa Tata ogh’olwanzo, Mugheni (Umukokaye).

2. Mweyo wawe k’Omwami, Kingula (Mukingilire), Isyakusigha hali, Kingula (Mukingilire). Risakana n’Omwira, Asyahumuly’omweyo, Naye Asyakuteya, Kingula (Mukingilire).

3. Nery’owa omulenge, gh’Omwami (‘Wa omulenge), Uyisinge emyatsi, Y’Omwami (Myatsi y’Omwami). Ukingule oluyi, S’umubwire ‘Iyihi’, Rina riwe ribuya, Y’Omwami (Rina ly’Omwami).

4. Kingula omutima, K’Omwami (Mukingilire), Wasyahabw’obutoki, B’Omwami (Buteya Bwetu), Asyamba obubuya, Asyalusya ebibi, Wamakingul’omweyo, K’Omwami (Mukingulire).

string.name: number103
string.htmlData:
103. UBUTAWE AKANDI
Ye Must Be Born Again
C.S. 26-Doh is Eb

1. Hali yo wasa ku Yesu mo kiro, Amubulya by’enzira y’erilama: Yesu mwamusubirya kweneny’ati: Kundu ngakubwira.

Erisuba mo : Ubutawe akandi, Ubutawe akandi, Kwenene, kwenene ngakubwira, Ubutawe kandi (Kundu).

2. Nenyu mwamakwa ekinywa kiwe, Ngoko Yesu abugha kyo kwenene, Nabyo byakubera muyisa neryo, Wasyalama kundu.

3. Abanzir’obuluhukiro bosi, N’erisyimba yo n’abasyalamibwa, Wasonda engebe ey’erikota, Wikirirye lino.

string.name: number104
string.htmlData:
104. UNYITABE NYINEMUKULIRIRA
Come, Great Deliverer, Come
CH 569-Doh is C

1. Unyitabe nyinemukulirira, Wase Mulamya waghe, Mutima waghe akulindirire, Wase Mulamya waghe.

Erisuba mo :
Namabitala haly’oko mwahge, Namabitala ingy’owene, Unyihekery’ewawe lino Mwami, Wase Mulamya waghe.

2. Sihali aho nangaluhukira, Wase Mulamya waghe, Umby’eritsema haghuma n’engebe, Wase Mulamya waghe.

3. Namaluh’enzira ni nyiri kundu, Wase Mulamya waghe, Ameso waghe akulindirire, Wase Mulamya waghe.

4. Mwami namasa, sighunyihemule, Wase Mulamya waghe, Wowe, Omulamy’ekiriro kyaghe, Wase Mulamya waghe.

string.name: number105
string.htmlData:
105. ANGATOKA ERILAMYA
Able To Deliver
C.S. 30-Doh is F

1. Angatok’erilamya, Mo byakakol’ebyosi; Angatok’erilamya, Abakamowa. Inyamulusy’omo muliro, Yesu katok’erilamya abamwanzire.

Erisuba mo :
Angatok’erilamya, n’erikulamya lino, Mulikyetu wamakwama, Asyakulamya.

2. Angatok’erilamya, Nikwa ni kindu kwehi? Anawite amaka w’erikulamya. Mbwire ebyosi mbwire, nikwa Kristo bita, Angatok’erimbohola n’erinyilamya.

3. Angatok’erilamya, Mughendi y’uluhire; Wamakwama Yesu iniasyakulamya. Sighusaghe Sitani, Uyanzire Yesu, Leka eritika-tika, Uyiketere.

string.name: number106
string.htmlData:
106. TWASYAHIMB’ENDATA W’ERIBWE
Build On The Rock
CH 579-Doh is Ab

1. Twasyahimb’endata w’eribwe, Yesu Ribwe rya kera; Twasyasika omw’ubahisya, Kanyabungu kabuha.

Erisuba mo :
Twasyahimb’edanta (Twasyahimb’endata w’Eribwe Rinene), Twasyahimb’edanta (Twasyahimb’endata w’Eribwe Rinene), Twasyahimb’endata w’eribwe, Endata wa Yesu.

2. Abandi bakahimb’oko museghe, Ow’ekihugho kino, Abandi mwisi gh’olututu, Lw’eritsem’omo bibi.

3. Himba naw’endata w’Eribwe, Kibanza kiwe kyowene, Kyokyasyabamo obuholo, Haghuma n’erilamibwa.

string.name: number107
string.htmlData:
107. UNYIBWIRE EBYA YESU
Tell Me The Story Of Jesus
CH 534-Doh is Eb

1. Unyibwire ebya Yesu, Ebisihire kundu, Biwite enzwere nene, Bikanyitsemesaya. Neryo balaika bangi, mobamwimbira kera, Kamwaleta obuholo, Oko bandu ab’ekihugo.

Erisuba mo : Unyibwire ebya Yesu, Saka by’oko mutima, Biwite enzwere nene, Bikanyitsemesaya.

2. Neryo ngoko bamuboha, Mo mbwarar’iyo wene, Neryo kamwakinda kundu, Ritebya rya Sitani. Omubiri owakola, N’ebiro by’obulighe, Neryo kamo bamwaghalya, Ebyosi niby’eriswekera.

3. Omwatsi gh’omusalaba, Mobamubamba kugho Neryo ngoko mobamuta, Kamwakind’eyisinda. Righenyera liwe ringi, Olwanzo luwe kwingye, Kamwatek’engebe yiwe, Nyihabawe erilama.

string.name: number108
string.htmlData:
108. OMULISYA MWANZE
Lovingly, Tenderly Calling
CH 572-Doh is F

1. Omulisya Mwanze akakubirikira, Omo kibungo kiwe, Ho haly’obuholo Kasonda abakali, Balume, Balwana, Yesu akasond’abo, Ibasa okwiye.

Erisuba mo :
Kabugh’omo mweyo gh’olukogho, Oyo waherire ase kwengye, Neryo ngakulinda alindire, Mwami Yesu Muslisya.

2. Kamwateka eribya ho busana netu, Asond’abaherire, Base kwiye lino. Twasyayitsingirir’ewuwe n’obuholo, Obw’eribirikira, Omulisya wetu.

3. Situlindirire kandy’enzighu Sitani, Ni soro eyo moli, Ikasyatuherya. Yesu yu katusonda, Omulamya wetu, Twingir’omo kibungo, Ho hali omwanya.

string.name: number109
string.htmlData:
109. NAHIRIRW’OKO LULENGO
Weighed And Wanting
C.S. 49-Doh is F

1. Omutsweri asyaby’asa, Asombola ebyetu; Tukasyabya ng’ezahabu, Kutse nga mataleyo.

Erisuba mo :
Nahirirw’oko lulengo, Lino syoswire, Nahirirw’omo kinyw’ekyo, Lino syoswire.

2. Nikwa twasyow’abugh’ati: Kundu namabasima, Kutsy’olubanza lw’eribohwa, Namey’isyoswire.

3. Neryo twitaby’omulenge, Endambi yikiri ho, Tulek’eriyighanyira, Itwayilebya kundu.

string.name: number110
string.htmlData:
110. BANEHO ABAKABIK’EMIGHAMBO
Blessed Are They That Do
C.S. 55-Doh is A

1. Wamow’ebinywa byo Mulamya, Kabyobikah’engebe ; Uwe munyabibi, Minya ko hane bakabik’emighambo.

Erisuba mo :
Bane ho abasyabike yosi, Bobatsemire,obatsema, Bane ho abasyabike yosi.Bakatsema, bakatsema.

2. Eryowa lisa, simuli ki, Nakakiribawa kundu, Twamow’itubaha, sitwangalama, Basyatsema basyow’eyosi.

3. Basyingira omo butseme, Mo muyi wa Nyamuhanga, Ahate obulighe n’eryaghalwa, Bahik’oko muti w’engebe.

string.name: number111
string.htmlData:
111. OBWIRA NA YESU
No, Not One
C.S. 57 Doh is F

1. Sihaly’omwir’oyuli nga Yesu, Sihali, sihali ; Oyo wangalamya omutima, Sihali, sihali.

Erisuba mo :
Yesu asy’amalighe wetu, Biro byosi akasondola, Sihaly’omwir’oyulinga Yesu: Sihali, Sihali.

2. Sihali endambi ate netu, Sihali, sihali ; Mwirimya syangatughaba kwiye, Sihali, sihali.

3. Sihali oy’ulingene naye, Sihali, sihali ; Oyo wangatulusya kw’ebibi, Sihali, sihali.

4. Syangabanik’oghundi Mulamya, Sihali, sihali ; Iye muta omusasi wuwe, Sihali, sihali.

string.name: number112
string.htmlData:
112. UNYISAMALIRE
Life In A Look
CH 65-Doh is Eb

1. Unyisamaliry’akatubwira, Yesu Yo watuholera ; Mo musalaba muly’engebe, Aho hanasyaban’ekighona.

Erisuba mo :
Samalir’e Kalwari, Samalir’e Kalwari, Nasyahabw’eribya ho, Nasamalir’omuti (W’e Kalwari).

2. Namalengwa k’omw’ibulikira, Enzighu syamanyitegha, Namalebya oko musalaba, Maka nasyabana gh’oko Mwami.

3. Nasamalira Omusalaba, Buli ughulu kwenene, Ndaghane nasyayiketera, Neryo kwenene sinangaluha.

string.name: number113
string.htmlData:
113. MWASE KWINGYE
Calling
CH 563-Doh is Ab

1. Yesu kabirikir’omo mbolere, Kasonda uwe naghe; Mo mweyo wetu kalinda riteya, Akakulinda uwe.

Erisuba mo :
Mwase kwingye, Abaluhire mwase, Yesu kabirikir’omo mbolere : Kasonde wase kwingye.

2. Akatusabira s’ulindirire, Anemutusabira, Isiwapon’obwenge n’olukogho, Lukogho luwe kwitwe.

3. Biro byeribya ho byalaba luba, byalaba kuwe naghe, Mwirimya asa, luholo lukasa, Lwasa kuwe no kwingye.

4. Ghanyira busana n’olwanzo luwe, Olwanzo kuwe, kwingye, Bibi byetu abiritubuyira, Ribuyirwa ni ryetu.

string.name: number114
string.htmlData:
114. LUYI LIKINGWIRE
The Gate Ajar For Me
CH 561-Doh is C

1. Omo lukyo olubuya, Luyi lukingukere ; Yesu abirilingula, Na silwangasyakingwa.

Erisuba mo :
Lunakinguker’okwingye, Lwamalekwa luty’okwingye, Kwingye, kwingye: Lutya, Luty’okwingye.

2. Luyi lunakingukere, Bandu balamibawe, Oko bera na bateke, Omo bihanda byosi.

3. Ukwamirire oluyi, Lukinakingukere, Uyising’omusalaba, Yo ndundi ey’olwanzo.

4. Musalaba wasyaheka, Biro byosi butseme, Lwanzo lwa Yesu ni lungi, Tukamukukamira.

string.name: number115
string.htmlData:
115. MUKUMU MUNENE
The Great Physician
CH 530-Doh is Eb

1. Mukumu Munene oyo, Yesu mweny’erilama ; Akaleta obutseme, Yesu, Mulamya wetu.

Erisuba mo :
Balaika bosi mwimbe, Tupipe Omwami wetu, Rina riwe ribuya, Ni rya Yesu Mwami.

2. Mupipe Mwana w’Embuli, Mupipe Omulamya, Malolo ghosi n’ebibi, Akalusay’aghosi.

3. Sihali erindi rina, Litoler’eripipwa, Kutse eritutsemesya, Kasiryangabanika.

4. Naye akandisyaswasa, N’olukengerwa luwe, Tukasyatsema na kera, Rikal’ewuwe, Mwami.

string.name: number116
string.htmlData:
116. WASOND’EBINDU?
Nothing For Jesus
C.S. 100-Doh is D

1. Wasond’ebindu s’uli, N’endambi ku Yesu? Mo mibiri mibuya, S’uli n’endambi kwiye Butseme bw’ekihugho, N’emyatsi y’obutseme, Ebyo ukasondaya, S’uli n’endambi kwiye.

2. Myats’ikutimbire ko, Kwiye s’uli n’endambi? Wanyewa n’ekihugho, Kwiye s’uli n’endambi? Takingula oluyi, Akahumanga lino, Endamby’akakusonda, Kwiye s’uli n’endambi?

3. Endambi y’enzwere, Kwiye mute n’omujbiri ? Mwitsingirire okwiye mute n’ommubiri? Uwe iwayitsemesya, N’eby’omo kihugho kino, S’uwite ndambi y’eri-kwamirir’ebya Yesu.

4. Uli bikoma bisa, S’uli mbuto sya Yesu? Ebyala biri busa, S’uli mbuto sya Yesu? S’uwite kyo wasyakangya, Ekiro asyaswasa, S’uli no obutseme, Walangira Omwami?

string.name: number117
string.htmlData:
117. NAMASEGHERA, MULAMYA
I Am Coming To The Cross
CH 224-Doh is Eb

1. Namabirikirwa, N’omulenge wawe ; Nyeribaw’omo musasi, Wawe ughutika.

Erisuba mo :
Namasegher’oko Musalaba, Nyeribawe kwenene, Mo musasi wawe.

2. Ingye molo kundu, Mowamb’akaghala, Wabirinyerya kw’ebibi, Nyikulindirire.

3. Yesu yo wanyanza, Omo Lwanzo lungi, Butseme, buholo kundu, Byasyaby’elubula.

4. Ukaha amaka, Omubiri wawe, Unyeray’omo musasi, Wawe oghutika.

5. Nabirilamibwa, Lwanzo n’olukogho, Kuwe Mwami ngwity’amaka, N’eritunganene.

string.name: number118
string.htmlData:
118. YESU MWALIHA
Jesus paid It All
C.S. 107-Doh is Eb

1. Yesu asi amaka wawe ni buyira ; Teghaya Omw’isaba, Uhabaw’omuyisa.

Erisuba mo :
Yesu mwaliha, Lubanza lwaghe, Ebibi byabya bingi, Naye mwery’ebyosi.

2. Mwami, namalangira, Akaghala kawe, Weraye emitima, Tuyire mo babuya.

3. Singwite kindi kindu, Ekyanganyilamya, Nasyer’omo musasi, Gh’Omulamiya Oyo.

4. Nasyaghend’omo bitu, Haghuma n’Omwami, Nambala akakira, Nyikukamire Yesu.

string.name: number119
string.htmlData:
119. ERIRIBA LY’OMUSASI
The Cleansing Wave
CH 598-Doh is Eb

1. Eririba ly’omusasi, Wa Yesu katwerya ; Kamwaghalibwa, Asonda tubane engebe.

Erisuba mo :
Ririba ly’omusasi, Namingira nyeribawe, Mwami nyeribawe kundu, akeraya, akeraya.

2. Musasy’akabugha kwingye, Monow’omulenge, Akabugha, Mweyo waghe, Ineribwa mugho.

3. Ngahangana inaghenda, Omw’ihenia liwe, Emyenda yamabyeribwa, Mutima ni Yesu.

4. Lukogho lw’eriswekera, Lukeray’emwisi, Ka nyiri na Yesu musa, Oyo y’Omulamya.

string.name: number120
string.htmlData:
120. SESENE, NAMIKIRIRYA
I Do Believe
CH 670-Doh is G

1. Tata singwity’Omulamya, Ni nawe wowene ; Neryo kwingye wamabiswa, Nyikole ki Tata?

Erisuba mo :
Sesene namikirirya, Yesu Yo wahola, Yowut’omusasi wuwe, Nyilwe omo bibi.

2. Nyikiriry’Omwana wawe, Umb’amaka wawe, Unyusulaye omuhwa, Oko ndambi eyi.

3. Ni butseme bungi kwingye, Rilol’oko busu, Nyiminy’omulenge wuwe, Nyiban’olukogho.

string.name: number121
string.htmlData:
121. NGANDIMB’OLWANZO LUWE
I Will Sing Of Jesus’ Love
CH 529-Doh is Bb

1. Ngandimba (Ngandimba), Lwanzo luwe, Lwanzo lwa (Lwanzo lwa) Yesu Mwami, Busana (Busana) kayowalwa, Okw’Ise, mwahola.

Erisuba mo :
Ngandimba (Ngandimba) Lwanzo luwe, Ripipa (Ripipa) nasyateka, Mwahola (Mwahola) ka nyibye ho: Ngandimb’olwanzo luwe.

2. Misonia (Misonia) kamwaliha, Nomo nde (Nomo nde) sindirira, Risaba (Risaba) siriri ho, Akanyisabira.

3. Olwanzo (Olwanzo) lungi olo; Kihugho (Kihugho) sikyasi lo, Buyira (Buyira) abab’ebibi, Ebingi ng’ebyaghe.

4. Sihali (Sihali) ebibuya, Ebyona (Ebyona) Birikola; Ngasonda (Ngasonda) tsuka lino, Nyikangay’olwanzo.

string.name: number122
string.htmlData:
122. HAHUHI NAWE
Nearer Still Nearer
CH 390-Doh is Db

1. Hakuhi nawe, nyiseghere, Hakuhi nawe ho nangikala ; Mwami nyanzire, Ungwate ko, Undeghaye sinangalwa kuwe, Undeghaye sinangalwa kuwe.

2. Hakuhi kundu, sindi naki, Sindi n’esadaka, Mwami Yesu. Mutima waghy’amabya mubi, Weraye gh’omo musasi wawe. Weraye gh’omo musasi wawe.

3. Hakuhi kundu, Uwe naghe, Nasyatsemer’erirek’ebibi, Matseme ghosi n’eripona, Umber’itsira byo kundu Yesu. Umber’itsira byo kundu Yesu.

4. Hakuhi kundu, n’oko nduli, N’omo lubula nasyahangana, Ebiro ebyosi nyine yo, Nasyalola oko busu bwawe. Nasyalola oko busu bwawe.

string.name: number123
string.htmlData:
123. HALY’ERINA LY’ERISWEKYA
The Holiest Name
C.S. 217-Doh is F

1. Haly’erina ly’eriswekya, Rilabir’awandi ghosi ; Nery’Omwami watuhangika, Na Mughala anyanzire.

Erisuba mo :
Ni rina ribuya, (Erina), Ni rina ribuya, Ryalwa ku Nyamuhanga ryasa hisi. Neryo rikimbawa (Erina), n’Abamalaika (Kwenene) Erin’eryo ni rya Yesu.

2. Neryo rikamb’omuyisa, Nyanzire eripipa ryo, Sindyumbay’eripipa ryo, Ngabwira obuli mundu.

3. Ekyangamba n’erisyimba, N’Abamalaika buwe, Nasyabya ngapip’erina, Rilabir’awandi ghosi.

string.name: number124
string.htmlData:
124. YESU MUSA
Not I, But Jesus
CH 271-Doh is Eb

1. Yesu musa y’utoler’eripipwa ; Nikwa ingye sindi kindu kundu. Sinyitolere ingye riyipipa, Yesu musa, Yowanganahulwa.

2. Yesu musa y’ukabugh’obulighe ; Nikwa ingye unyiwatikaye. Sinangakolera ebyanganduhya Nikwa Yesu kay’unatolere.

3. Yesu musa Yo wanganahalambwa; Sinyitolere eriyipipa. Yesu musa, asyanyibanika mo, Erisyahika eribya nga Ye.

4. Yesu musa y’ukabugha obwera ; Niye musa ngah’ebyagh’ebyosi. Yesu musa, yukandeter’ebyosi, Yesu musa, nyiyibere nawe.

string.name: number125
string.htmlData:
125. EKYAKAKALA KIBUYA
Sunlight In The Heart
CH 612-Doh is A

1. Oko kitwa kuli henia, Erihenia ly’eryuba ; Mo malima n’omo ngetsi, N’eryuba rihenirye. Erihenia ni rinene, Omo mutima waghe, Kusangw’aho Yesu ali, Hali ekyakakala.

Erisuba mo : Ekyakakala kibuya, Kiri omo mutima, Aho Mwami Yesu ali, Hali ekyakakala.

2. Ng’esyongimba ngulukulu, Ngalusay’obulighe, Omwenda ogh’obutseme, Watoler’eryambalwa. Ngakukwam’omo mutima, N’omo nyumba y’endata, Eyasitikawa ndeke, Mwisi gh’olwanzo luwe.

3. Yesu wanyitongolaya, Ndi wawe lino Mwami, Byosi ni byawe Mulamya, Biro byosi ngupipe. Ngakukwam’omo mutima, N’omo nyumba y’endata, Eyasitikawa ndeke, Mwisi gh’olwanzo luwe.

string.name: number126
string.htmlData:
126. OLW’ABIKIRIRYE
Since I Have Been Redeemed
CH 638-Doh is G

1. Nyine n’olwimbo lubuya, Olw’abikirirye ; Lo Mulamya Nyamuhanga, Olw’abikirirye.

Erisuba mo :
Olw’abikirirye, Olw’abikirirye Rina riwe ripipwe Olw’abikirirye, Ngandisyapip’erina riwe.

2. Kristo atolere kundu, Olw’abikirirye ; Risonde riwe nyanzire, Olw’abikirirye.

3. Nyinemutula gho kundu, Olw’abikirirye ; Rikahigh’itikatika, Olw’abikirirye.

4. Ndi n’obwikalo bubuya, Olw’abikirirye ; Nyine haghuma na Yesu, Olw’abikirirye.

string.name: number127
string.htmlData:
127. NYAMUHANG’ASY’ESYONYUNYU
He Loves Me To
C.S. 252-Doh is F

1. Nyamuhang’asy’esyonyunyu esikatoghonga ; Amanzatya esyonyunyu, Naghe anyanzire.

Erisuba mo :
Anyanzire, anyanzire, anyanzire kundu, Nyinasi kwanyanzire, Ingye nyiri muke.

2. Mubatsi mubuya akasitik’obusoyo, Amanzatya obusoyo, Atya anyanzire.

3. Nyamuhanga wahangik’ensyonyunyu, busoyo, Syangibirirwa abana, Kundu anzire bo.

string.name: number128
string.htmlData:
128. NDAMBI MBUYA Y’ERISABA
Blessed Hour Of Prayer
CH 324-Doh is Eb

1. Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Twamabiyikehya ; Neryo twamasa kwiye Yesu, y’Omwira. Tuwity’erikirya, Kw’ali Omuteya, Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo.

Erisuba mo :
Ndambi ’isaba, eyeritsema ho Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo..

2. Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Amas’Omulamya ; Lyowene iniowa abana buwe. Katubwira tuhire, Mo maghulu wuwe, Miheke yetu yosi, Imo twasyatsema yo.

3. Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Bangatok’eryasa ; K’Omwami Yesu Abakalengawa ko. Mweyo wuwe mubuya, Asyababuyira, Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo.

4. Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Tukandisyahabwa ; Miyisa y’omutima, Twamikirirya. Twamikirirya kundu, Sitwendisyubaha, Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo.

string.name: number129
string.htmlData:
129. YESU WAS’EWETU
Jesus Come And Bless Us
CH 602-Doh is Ab

1. Wabiritugha neryo babiri, Basaty’oko rina ryawe bamasa ; Wasyatsumula bo, na munabwire, Twamakukwama omo nyumba yawe.

Erisuba mo :
Yesu was’ewetu, Ututsumule, Yesu was’ewetu, Ubye hakuhi.

2. Wabiribya netu, mo bindi biro, Tunemukulinda, nery’utwasire, Wase Omulamya, tuhy’olukogho, Utowe Yesu na ututsumule.

3. Wase utabal’emirenge yetu, Mo nyimbo n’omwisaba, bihamule; Kirirya rikanye, riminyikale, Lwanzo lubye lubuy’enzira mbuya.

string.name: number130
string.htmlData:
130. NDI WAWE MWAMI
I am Thine O Lord
CH 594-Doh is Ab

1. Ndi wawe Mwami ngow’omulenge, Unemubugha naghe, Kwenene, kundu, ngasonde kuwe, Nyisik’eryas’ey’uli.

Erisuba mo :
Mwami nyase (nyase), Nyase hakuhi, Kundu kuwe k’omuti? Mwami nyase (nyase), Nyase hakuhi K’omusasi w’enzwere.

2. Nyihire lino, nyikukolere, Mo maka gh’olukogho, Ebyo wanzire naghe nanze byo, Nyisik’erikukwama.

3. Nyiri n’obutseme buli ndambi, (I)nyinemukania nawe, Ngo yukakanaya no omwira, Inyinakukamire.

string.name: number131
string.htmlData:
131. NANGAKUSOSA KUNDU
More Lile Jesus
C.S. 286-Doh is F

1. Nangakusosa kundu, Yesu Mulamya waghe, Umb’erikola ndele, Mba lwanzo lw’eriswekera. Nangakusosa kwenene, Aho ngaya ehosi, Namayikehya kundu, Mwami nyikukwamirire.

2. Inyatey’ekihungu, Kamiya kisukali, Sinangubaha kundu, Nyinasi ko nyine nawe. Wasyayisy’eriteya, Unyibuyire obubi, Namayikehya kundu, Mwami nyikukwamirire.

3. Nangakusosa kundu, Ngukwame biro byosi, Mbire hakuhi nawe, Ahatehwa obuholo. Ukambindula mo muhya, Busana n’olwanzo lwawe, Namayikehya kundu, Mwami nyikukwamirire.

string.name: number132
string.htmlData:
132. MUSALABA WA YESU
Near The Cross
CH 595-Doh is F

1. Musalaba wa Yesu, Nyikale hakuhi Eyo hali isoko, Yangalamy’ebibi.

Erisuba mo :
Hali musalaba, Musalaba wuwe, Oyo n’ipipa ryaghe, Omwibya ho ryosi.

2. Hakuhi musalaba, Monatitimana, Lwanzo molwandangira, Molwanyibuyira.

3. Unyibuke Mulamya, Ngulangire eyo, Nyiban’olwanzo lwawe, n’erikulwa nalo.

4. Hakuhi, Musalaba, Nyimuyiketere, Riteya n’eririnda, Nasyikala eyo.

string.name: number133
string.htmlData:
133. NYIRENDERE NAWE MWAMI
Walking With God
CH 195-Doh is Ab

1. Nyirendere nawe Mwami, Ngo kwalendera Henoki, Ungwaty’okuboko kwaghe, Ubughe naghy’omo mbolere, Nomo ndalangire enzira Yesu nyirendere nawa.

2. Sinangatoka tute nawe, Haly’ebisund’elubula, Bitegho bighonye by’enzighu, Syonzighu nyingi sin’omo nzira Uhumulaye n’engetsi Yesu nyirendere nawe.

Unyiwaty’oko kuboko, Amatseme kwengye n’italya, Mo maka nyinemughenda Tuhekire omusalaba, Tway’omo muyi Sayuni Yesu nyirendere nawe.

string.name: number134
string.htmlData:
134. OLWANZO LW’ERISWEKERA
Wonderful Love Of Jesus
CH 650-Doh is C

5. Ekyangamba erimba ngapipa Omwami waghe, Nikwa nindi wangatok’erimba eripipwa rya Yesu.

Erisuba mo :
Olwanzo, lw’eriswekera, Olwanzo lwa Yesu, Olwanzo lw’eriswekera, Olwanzo lwa Yesu.

6. Ka yona butseme bwaghe, Ka yukanamb’obuholo, Mo bulighe n’omwaghalwa, Yesu yu kanambumulaya.

7. Yonaye ngayiketera, Erisyahabwa engebe, M’omwirimy’inyakolerya, Yesu yukanambumulaya.

string.name: number135
string.htmlData:
135. NYIKWANZIRE KWILABA MWAMI
I Love Thee Better Lord
C.S. 301-Doh is C

1. Nyikwanzire, Mwami Yesu kwilaba ebyosi, Kusang’ukanzemesaya, Ni mbolere Mwami.

Erisuba mo :
Kinywa kyawe kyangatulwa (Kyatulwa), Eky’olwanzo lwawe, Kinywa kyawe kyangatulwa (Kyatulwa), Musasy’akeraya (Keraya).

2. Nyikwasi uli hakuhi, kwilab’ekihugho; Erikwibuka lyowene, Kwilaba erimba.

3. Kundu unyitsemesaye, Naghe nasyatsema, Namabya nyite n’olwanzo, Lwawe, ni buyira.

4. Byasyabya biti Mulamya, Erikala nawe, Nikw’omo kihugho kino, Tunatsemire kwehi?

string.name: number136
string.htmlData:
136. AHW’ASYANZONDOLA HOSI
I Remember Calvary
C.S. 305-Doh is Eb

1. Ahw’asyanzondola hose, Honasyatsemer’eriya, Kusangwa ingy’aholera, Mwangwira ate n’ekibi.

Erisuba mo :
Yesu kanzondola kundu, Nahik’ewuwe buholo, Kwali Yo Mwira nyanzire, Syali atambemukira.

2. Ngatsemer’eribya naye, Ngatsemer’erinzondola ; Ngatsemera erimowa, Kusangwa ingy’aholera.

3. Sinditikatika kundu, Ko ndi haghuma na Yesu, Nyinayiketere kundu, N asyamulolako Mwami.

string.name: number137
string.htmlData:
137. NGASOND’OMWAMI YESU
Give Me Jesus
CH 596-Doh is F

1. Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Kihugho kikanyitebya, Yesu abuyirire.

Erisuba mo :
Lukogho ni lw’eriswekya, Lwanzo lute lulengo, Erilama eryoswire, Tubikirwe engebe.

2. Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Mo bulighe bungi Iye, Ni lwimbo olubuya.

3. Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Mo lughendo lw’ekihugho, Kayo butseme bwaghe.

4. Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Musalaba nyikirirye, Ngasyalola ku Yesu.

string.name: number138
string.htmlData:
138. TWALA ENGEBE YAGHE
Entire Consecration
C.S. 316 - Doh is D

1. Twala engebe yaghe, Bisabo by’obutumbya, Twala ndambi sy’ekiro, Isyakupipa eyo.

Erisuba mo :
Nyeray’omo mumsasi wawe (Nyere kundu), Unyeraye kw’ebibi byosi (Nyere kundu), Ebyagh’ebyosi, Nyikutekere byo Lino n’endambi syosi.

2. Twala ebyala nabyo, bikole eby’ukanza, Twala bisando byaghe, Mo busondoli bwawe.

3. Twal’omulenge waghe, Nyimbire Nyamuhanga, Twala n’eminywa yaghe, Yusul’ekinywa kyawe.

4. Twal’ezahabu nibya, N’ebyosi by’ekihugho, Twala n’amenge waghe, Ukole ko wanzire.

5. N’erighanirya Mwami, Siryangabya eryaghe, Twala mweyo ni wawe, Abye bwikalo bwawe.

6. Twal’erisonda ryaghe, Pipa ry’omweyo waghe, Twala kundu mutima, Nyibye wawe kwilaba.

string.name: number139
