string.htmlData:
139. NYIWITE OMWIRA
I’ve Found Friend
CH 531 - Doh is A

1. Nyiwite Omwira naye, Oyo wanyanza kera, Lukoba l’olwanzo luwe, Nabohirwe na kera. Akakur’omweyo waghe, Alek’eribinduka, Nyiniker’emwisi wuwe, Ali naghe na kera.

2. Nyiwite Omwira Iye, Oyo wanyiholera, Muta omusasi wuwe, oko bandu abose. Ingye singwite ki kandi, Nomo nangabya nabyo, Niby’ebyosi inabwekwa, Ngye ndi wuwe na kera.

3. Nyiwite Omwira naye, Mwahabwa obutoki, Asyanyiteya iyowene, Asyanyitwal’endata. Namasamalir’ewuwe, Ngabya n’amaka kundu, Lino ngakolera ahisi, Nyum’endata na kera.

4. Nyiwite Omwira naye, Ali n’omweyo mwenge, Ni Muhani, ni Musondoli, Muteya w’ekwenene. Nindi yo wanganyighaban’Omwanze ow’embere, Kwiye ngayikakiraya, Ngye ndi wuwe na kera.

string.name: number140
string.htmlData:
140. YESU YO WAMBIRIKIRA
The Voice of Jesus
CH 226 - Doh is D

1. Yesu Yo wambirikira, Wase mo butseme, Mutwe waghe aghotsere, Mo kikuba kyaghe. Monaghenda yali luba, Kundu monaluha, Yo wamba neryo buholo, N’obutseme kundu.

2. Yesu Yo wambirikira, Wase kwingye unywe, Maghesti w’engebe busa, Unywe kandy’ubye ho. Monaghenda yali luba, Maghetsi monanywa, Nyiri ho kwiye n’enyota, Kayahwere kundu.

3. Yesu Yo wambirikira, Kihugho mwirimya, Wamalebya kyakakala, Kyamakukolerya. Monaghenda yali luba, Iye ryuba ryaghe, Mo buli endambi yaghe, Mo lughendo lwaghe.

string.name: number141
string.htmlData:
141. MBYE WAWE MWAMI
Wholly Thine
CH 597 - Doh is Ab

1. Mwami bye wawe, namabugha, Ngukwame, ngukwame, Ngole by’ukanza, Mwami waghe, Ungwatikaye.

Erisuba mo :
Mbye wawe (Mwami), Mbye wawe (Mwami), Eryo risonda lyaghe Mbye wawe (Mwami), Mbye wawe (Mwami), Mbye wawe Mwami lino.

2. Ebya hisi sinzomene byo, Neryo nyibye nawe, Byosi nyighambawe byo kundu, Ndi wawe nawe.

3. Nikwa obutsema bwa hisi, Wase tubye nawe, Ebinywa byo bikanzemesya, Bimbumulaye.

string.name: number142
string.htmlData:
142. KIRO EKI KY’E SABATO
How Sweet Upon This Sacred Day CH 458 - Doh is Eb

1. Kiro eki kye Sabato, Kiro ky’eribuka, Kya Nyaluhanga w’endata, Rirek’ekihugho.

2. Twangow’ekinywa kibuya, Rilw’oko Muhani, Rituhana, ribinduka, Tubane engebe.

3. Nery’omo malwa n’ebibi, Nikwa twamakindwa, In’asyatuh’akaghala, Oyo wasy’omweyo.

string.name: number143
string.htmlData:
143. TWAMABUKA TUTSUMULE
Lord; Dismiss Us
CH 33- Doh is E

1. Twamabuka, tutsumule, Utuhe eritsema, Tubye n’olwanzo lwawe, Lukogho lw’erikinda, Nawe utuhumulaye, Tunemughenda ahisi.

2. Tukakupipa n’ewasingya, Omo kinywa ky’Engulu, Bighuma biwe rilama, Byabanika okwitwe, Endambi yosi tuminye, Ekinywa kyawe Yesu.

3. Biro byetu tulina byo, Tuyiteke ku Yesu, Tubye n’amaka, mo mweyo, Situluh’omo nzira; Hotwasyaloler’oko lukengerwa (o)lo Mukama.

string.name: number144
string.htmlData:
144. MWAMI UNYISONDOL’ENDATA
Higher Ground
CH 631 - Doh is Ab

1. Ndim’olughendo lw’endate, Biro byosi ngahetuka, Ngasab’inyinemughenda, Mwami unyisondolere.

Erisuba mo :
Mwami unyisumb’endate, Ngwikiriray’elubula, Ndata kwilab’ekihugho, Mwami unyisondolere.

2. Mweyo waghe kasyanzire, Rikala ahaly’obubi, Abandi banziry’ahisi, Risonda lyaghe n’iruka.

3. Ngasond’eriruk’endata, Sinyikindawe n’enzighu, Mw’ikirirya ngandisyowa, Mirenge y’abasyakinda.

4. Iruk’endata ngasonda, Inalola okw’ihenia, N’oko nduli nasyasaba, Mwami unyisondolere.

string.name: number145
string.htmlData:
145. SIGHUGHANE OMUBIRI
Ask Not To Be Excused
C.S. 513 - Doh is E

1. S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami, Yiteghekerania, Ughende ukole. Eyo Nyamuhanga kasond’ikutuma, Iwasyatsema yo mo mubiri wuwe.

Erisuba mo :
Ngasonda, wase sighughane, Ngasonda, ukoly’omibiri. S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami Kwenene, kwenene, S’ukahiw’ewuwe.

2. S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami, Unemukola ki? Ukoly’omubiri. Righesa lyamera, Abake baghesa, Kangay’obutseme, Mw’ikoler’Omwami.

3. S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami, Erighan’olwanzo, Kuwe ni buhanya. Ndambi y’olukogho, Yesu akasaba, Ikangay’ebibi, Bihw’omo lubula.

string.name: number146
string.htmlData:
146. TABAL’EMWISI WAGHE
Thy Life Within Me
CH 279 - Doh is Eb

1. Tabal’emwisi waghe, Uwe Yesu Mwami, Ubye kwing’isubirya, Okwibulya lyaghe. Ubye ho mwisi waghe, Uwe Musondoli, Ubukobe ni bwaghe, Bwawe ry’erihenia.

2. Ngatek’ekisabiro, Wabiribirya kyo, Linw’erihenia lyawe, Lyakolery’emwisi. Kihugho ikyahuna, Omubiri abye; Omukobe mubuya, Ow’erikusikya.

3. Bitsuko by’omubiri, Byosi byakulinda, Byasond’ibyaghenda, Ibiman’erikola. Hate eriyitonga, kutse eripona, Kutse eryendererya, Hat’eriyihania.

4. Nyibye oyuhehere, Sinyiyire luba, Nyisike inalinda, Ebihano byawe. Tabal’emwisi waghe, Uwe Yesu Mwami, Ubye kwingy’isubirya, Mo mabulyo ghosi.

string.name: number147
string.htmlData:
147. UNYIRETE HAKUHI
Draw Me Closer To Thee
CH 632 - Doh is A

1. Unyirete hakuhi Tata, Unyibaghalire, Nyisegheray’oko kikuba, Ngasond’ilihuka.

Erisuba mo :
Unyirete hakuhi, (Nyase, unyirete hakuhi), Mo muliki w’olwanzo, (Muliki w’olwanzo). Unyirete (mo muliki w’olwanzo, unyirete hakuhi) Hakuhi nawe (Unyirete hakuhi).

2. Unyirete Mulamya waghe, isitwaghabana, Ebyala byawe biri kwingye, Lino ndangire byo.

3. Unyirete m’omweyo wawe, Nyisosane nawe, Unyeraye, nyiluhukaye, Mbye mubuya kundu.

string.name: number148
string.htmlData:
148. EHOSI NA YESU
Anywhere With Jesus
CH 589 - Doh is D

1. Ehosi na Yesu nyinemutsema, Eyakandwala Yesu ni butseme. Amabya ateho, sihatolere, Amabya ho Yesu Sinangubaha.

Erisuba mo :

Ehosi, Ehosi, Sinangubaha, Ehosi na Yesu naghenda naye.

2. Amabya ho Yesu sind’ingyowewe, Nomo nangaghanwa,Nomo ndi muke. Mwanganyisondol’omo nzira nyibi; Namabya na Yesu nasyamupipa.

3. Amabya ho Yesu mo nangaya to, Natok’eriluhuk’omw’ilubuka. Nyuma nasyaghend’ewuwe na kera, Amabya ho Yesu, Butsema kundu.

string.name: number149
string.htmlData:
149. GENDER’OMO MWISI
Walk In The Light
C.S. 540 - Doh is D

1. Mwira ulabe omo mwisi, Neryo sutime-time, Omuka mubuya w’endata, Akusondolere.

Erisuba mo :
S na A : Ghender’omo mwisi, Ghender’omo mwisi,
\t\t Ghender’omo mwisi, Mwisi mubuya wa Yesu.
T na B: Ghender’omo w’eriswekera wa Yesu,
\t\t Ghender’omo w’eriswekera wa Yesu,
\t\t Ghender’omo w’eriswekera wa Yesu,
\t\t Omo w’akaka wa Yesu.

2. Ghender’omo mwisi mubuya, Omo kinywa ky’Omwami, Asyakusondola na kera, Asyakolera ho.

3. Ughender’omo kyakakala, Ubye ukamukwama, Koleraya omo mwirimya, Hosi hahenaye.

4. Ghendera omo kyakakala, ‘Miny’olwanzo lwa Yesu, No kwanza abali ahisi, Neryo mwalamya bo.

string.name: number150
string.htmlData:
150. NIKWA ABAGHESI BALI HAYI?
Where Are The Reapers?
CH 620 - Doh is G

1. Nikwa abaghesi bali hayi? Baghesere abatunganene, Bakengete kund’omo mitemi, Neryo ka sibabye abaghata!

Erisuba mo :
‘Kwa abaghesi, bali hayi? Babye haghuma netu tuyaghese, Neryo tutseme tune nabo, Erighesa ryasabya ryahwa.

2. Musondere omo miyi yosi, Lutswamba lwamaleng’oko ngano, Musisonde neryo sine mulo, Syosi imwasighesera Yesu.

3. Lebaya amalim’amabyera, Abosi balindir’erighesa, Nikwa abaghesi ka ni bake, Omubiri linw’akabasonda.

4. Inywe bandu mwimay’emitemi, Mughese endambi yikiri ho, Mubye n’omuhwa Omwamy’akasa, Lebaya amalet’ebihembo.

string.name: number151
string.htmlData:
151. SINYASY’EMBITA YAGHE
Will There Be Any Stars
CH 626 - Doh is A

1. Lino ngibuka ekihugho kibuya, Kyongasonda erilola ko, Nasyahangana hakuhi n’Omulamya, Mbita hasyaby’esyongununu.

Erisuba mo :
Sinyasy’embita yaghe ng’esyongununu, Syasyaheny’oko buli ndambi. Ngandisyabya nabuka omo syongonde, Hasyabya ngununu ko mbita.

2. Mo maka w’Omwami nyikole mubiri, Nyiret’emitima y’abandu, Neryo nyibye n’esyongununu ko mbita, Mwami akatuh’ebihembo.

3. Nasyabya n’obutseme namulola ko, Naleta emuliro wuwe, Bandu balamibawa busana n’omubiri waghe n’Omuka wuwe.

string.name: number152
string.htmlData:
152. YESU BUGH’OMO MWEYO
Speak To My Soul
CH 554 - Doh is Eb

1. Yesu bugh’omo mweyo, Bugh’omo mbolere, Bugha kwingye mo lwanzo, S’undek’ingyowene. Kingul’omweyo waghe, Imonowa ndeke, Hira mweyo mw’ipipa, Nyikupupe Mwami.

Erisuba mo :
Buli kiro, ubughe, Uty’omo mbolere, Nyombomber’embolere, Mbolere y’olwanzo. Biro byosi wakinda, Bwiranda ni bwawe, Neryo nyowe ebinywa, S’undek’ingyowene.

2. Bugha n’abana wawe, Kangaya b’enzira, Busule obutseme, Baminy’erisaba. Bayitsing’eriteka, Ribya ho ribuya, Obwami imo bwasa, Twaghey’Omulamya.

3. Neryo bugh’emigambo, Ngoko wateka yo, Ibuyirire kundu, Mighambo yowene. Nyitok’erikupipa, Uwe Mwami waghe, Risonda ryawe kundu, Nyikole ngupipe.

string.name: number153
string.htmlData:
153. OMW’ISONDA ERY’ENGYAKYA
Just For Today
CH 604 - Doh is G

1. Omwisona ery’engyakya, Sindisaba, Wayiteya sinyikole bibi lino. Sinyibughe kinywa kibi, Mutongolya, N’erighanirya obubi, Lino, nyitya.

2. Nangakola omubiri, Ng’erisaba, Nangabere mundu omubuya kundu. Risonda ryawe nyikole, Rikusikya, Mubiri aby’obuhere, Lino, nyitya.

3. Neryo lino namahola, Mw’ikanuka, Nyiyiketer’endaghane, syawe Mwami. Omw’isonda ery’engyakya, Sindisaba, Unyisondole, ‘nyibike, lino, nyitya.

string.name: number154
string.htmlData:
154. UNYIBWIRE, UWE MUTEYA
Watchman, Tell Me
CH 180 - Doh is G

1. Unyibwire we Muteya, Bwasesukere kwehi? Erihenia ry’e Sayuni, Haly’ebiminyikalo? We mughendi uhangane, Usayire elubula, Iwambala n’omo mbindi, Ni musakala lino.

2. Muteya takoleraya, Omo syonzira syawe , Biminyikalo byasyasa, Kw’ekiro ni hakuhi. Ngubi ikandisyabugha, Yasyabuky’abaholire, Babuyirire b’Omwami, Bahabw’obutahola.

3. Muteya lebaya ndek’erihenia ry’e Sabato, Emireng’ikatula gho, Obwami ni hakuhi. Omughendi namalebya, Ekitwa ky’e Sayuni, Muyi w’e Yerusalema, N’erihenia rya mugho.

4. Aho Nyamuhang’ikere, Ni muyi w’ezahabu Omo kitumbi kibuya, Oyo Yu katabala. Haly’obuholo ehosi, Amalima akabogha, N’ekitaka kiboghire, Syonyusi syowene nga.

5. Muteya tuli hakuhi, N’ekihugho kyowene, Tughende yo m’obutseme, Kihugho ky’obuholo. Neryo mowe haly’olwimbo, Olw’ababirilamibwa, Tughende tuyahindane, N’endeko nene eyo.

string.name: number155
string.htmlData:
155. NASYABYA AHO UKASONDA
I’ll Go Where You Want Me To Go
C.S. 566 - Doh is F

1. Mbino sim’om’obitwa, Aho wasyambirikirira Mbino isim’omo ngetsi, Kutse ahaly’amalwa. Neryo wamambirikira lino, N’enzira isinyasi yo, Mwam’inasubirya nyisikiry’eriya eyu kanyituma.

Erisuba mo :
Nasyaya ah’ukasonda, Mwami, Mo bitwa n’omo syongetsi, Nyighende, eyu kambirikira Nyikukwamy’ey’ukaya.

2. Mbino lino hali ekinywa, kisihire ky’olwanzo, Neryo kyo Yesu akasonda, Nyitul’omo mbolere. Wamabya haghuma naghe, Mwami, Nyimusondesonde lino, Sindirek’eritwal’Engulu Yawe, Aho wasyandwal’ahosi.

3. Aho twangakol’omubiri N’omwighes’amalima, Omubii nangamukolera, Yesu Mutongolya. Neryo namayiketera We, Kusangw’unanyanzire, Erisonda ryawe nasyakola lyo, Nyibye n’ebyo wanzire.

string.name: number156
string.htmlData:
156. YIHI, EBINYWA EBIBI
Angry Words! Oh Let Them Never
C.S. 581 - Doh is Eb

1. Yihi, ebinywa ebibi, Isibyalw’omo buno, Omutima mubuya n’esyondim’isisyatsanda.

Erisuba mo :
Nenyu mwanzane (Mwanzane), Kabugha Yesu (Mwanzane), Ng’erimbere ngokw’abiritwanza. Nenyu mwanzane (Mwanzane), Kabugha Yesu (Mwanzane), Abana baghe mwanzane.

2. Lwanzo ni lubuyirire, N’obwira obubuya, Sibiheribawe busana n’eribugha nabi.

3. Situbugh’omw’ihitana, Bikalet’obulighe, Lwanzo lwawe, we Mulamya, Utuhe erikinda.

string.name: number157
string.htmlData:
157. NI NDAMBI Y’ERIGHESA
Harvest Time
CH 627 - Doh is Eb

1. Mundu mwaghend’akalira, Mwahuluky’embuto mbuya, Nomw’angaluha syangumbya, ‘Niatsumulwa n’Omwami.

Erisuba mo :
Neryo kasinemukula, Imwalebya ko singana, Amalima, ghosy’erire, Ni ndambi y’erighesa.

2. Ekimi kikalw’endata, Ni kyakakala kibuya, Kikalek’embuto yera, Mo lukogho l’Omwami.

3. Bib’embuto sighumbaye, Suhahukay’omutima, Wamalangira syamera, Ughese omw’itsema.

string.name: number158
string.htmlData:
158. MUKOLE LUBA
Hasten On, Glad Day
C.S. 589 - Doh is Eb

1. Erighesa ry’ahisi ryamahika, Yesu akabirikir’abaghesi, Lebay’amalima amer’ehosi, Mulete emitemi muyaghese.

Erisuba mo :
S: \t Mukole, luba, mubik’emighanda
\t\t Mukole, luba, Imwasa
A.T.B: \t Mukole luba mwase, imwasa,
\t\t Muhunik’emighanda, imwasa.
\t\t Mukole luba mwase, imwasa,
\t\t Imwasa luba.

2. Ekirw’ekyo sihabye ukalira, Uyiteghaye omo ngyakya syosi, Emighulu yalabir’erihunga, Mukole luba mbula yite yawa.

3. Lwanzo luli ng’eyisoko yityuma, Lukalwa elubul’oko Mutoki, Lo lukatulembera erikola, Ilwatusikya situbye baghata.

string.name: number159
string.htmlData:
159. NYINE MUKUSONDA
How Much Need Thee
CH 578 - Doh is G

1. Yesu nyinemukusonda, Indi mbumi n’omwera, Unyiwate oko byala, Kuwe ngaban’amaka.

Erisuba mo :
Mukama buli ndambi, Yesu nyinemukusonda, Mukama buli ndambi, Ndaghaye buli ndambi.

2. Unyambalaye emyenda, Yaghu y’amenge wawe, Myenda yaghe itsandire, Nyinemuyitsutsa We.

3. Uwe wamanyisondola, Inaghenda buholo, Ghenda naghe biro byosi, W’enzira ey’engebe.

4. Namahika oko ndambi, Eyaghe y’obulighe, Kutse ihali butseme, Ndeghaye buli ndambi.

string.name: number160
string.htmlData:
160. KYANGAMB’ERIBYA WAWE
Kept For Jesus
C.S. 598 - Doh is D

1. Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Namaghambw’eby’ahisi, Nyikukwamirire.

Erisuba mo :
Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Namayiteka kundu. Mbul’omughaso, ndi ki, ndi ki, Umbe eriminywa.

2. Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Ngole ebyo wanzire, Nyibye ngakukenga.

3. Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Mbighul’oko by’ahisi, Unyeraye kundu.

4. Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Mbye wawe ngoko nyiri, Bindu sibingaghe.

string.name: number161
string.htmlData:
161. MWAMI NAGHE
My Lord And I
CH 532 - Doh is F

1. Namabiban’Omwira, Ow’enzwere nene, Ananyanzire kwenene, M’olwanzo olungi. Nasyabya haghuma naye, Ha eno sinyasi, Tunikere haghuma, Mwami naghe.

2. Neryo namaswaghalwa, ‘Waminya ko nyiri, Neryo nyiyiketere, Yo walaliraya. ‘Rinyisondola mo nzira, Hali kyakakala, Tukaghenda haghuma, Mwami naghe.

3. Ngamubwir’amalighe, N’obutseme bwaghe, N’ebikanyiluhay’eno, N’ebyangatsemesya. Akambamul’erikola, Ebinyitolere, Nyanzire iniakania, Mwami naghe.

4. Anasy’ebyo ngasonda, Eriret’abandu, Ukamba omubiri, Inyine mutula gho. Nyiyatul’olwanzo luwe, Okuki mwahola, Tukahana haghuma, Mwami naghe.

string.name: number162
string.htmlData:
162. MO NZIR’AKANYISONDOLA
All The Way
CH 259 - Doh is Ab

1. Mo nzir’akanyisondola, Yesu waghe Mulamya, Syendisyakehy’olukogho, Musondoli wa kera. Ni butsem’erimukwama, Mo kihugho kwenene, Nomo nangaluha kundu, Yukakol’ebibuya : Nomo nangaluha kundu, Yukakol’ebibuya.

2. Mo nzir’akanyisondola, Akakehay’omwagha, Namalwala inandamya, N’omo nzal’inughuta. Nomo nangaluha kundu, Maka nomw’angakeha, Ribwe rin’embere syahge, Rikanyiluhukaya : Ribwe rin’embere syahge, Rikanyiluhukaya.

3. Mo nzir’akanyisondola, Omo lwanzo lunene, Nduli asyanyihumulya, Uwe Tata w’endata. Nambalibw’obutahola, Nikala n’Omulamya, Nasyamuha eripipa, kundu y’Omusondoli : Nasyamuha eripipa, kundu y’Omusondoli.

string.name: number163
string.htmlData:
163. YESU AKABIRIKIRA
Here, Am I, Send Me
CH 447 - Doh is D

1. Yesu akabirikira, Nindi yo nagatuma, Erighesa ryamahika, Nindi yo wangaghesa. Ko mubiri akasonda, Akatek’ebihembo, Nindi yo wangasubirya, Nyine Mwami nyitume.

2. Wamaby’ute wangaghenda, N’erisoka engetsi, Neryo hali ab’ebibi, Abatamwasi Yesu. Wamaby’uli n’esisoni, Ribugha nga Paulo, Watok’erikangirirya, Olwanzo l’Omulamya.

3. Wamaby’isiwangatoka, ‘Riteya oko luyi, Uwatikaye abandu mo nzira ey’engebe. Mw’isaba n’omo bihembo, Risaba riwatikya, Ngoko Aruni mwatalwik’amaboko wa Musa.

4. Bandu baly’omo bulighe, Yesu akabasonda, S’ubughe omw’ikereta, Singwite omubiri. Utsemery’omubiry’oyo, Abirikuh’Omwami, Umusubiraya luba, Uti Mwami nyitume.

string.name: number164
string.htmlData:
164. MO BISANDO BYAWE YESU
At The Fee Of Jesus
CH 618 - Doh is F

1. Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Binywa biwe bibuya, Ahandu haly’obuholo, Nyibye ho biro byosi. Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Ngibuk’olwanzo lwawe, Ni obwenge buwe kwingye, Bukanyitsemesaya.

2. Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Handu habuya kundu, Nangalek’ebibi byaghe, Haly’obuluhukiro. Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Aho ho ngasabira, Ngasung’amaka okwiye, Butseme n’olukogho.

3. Unyitsumule Mulamya, Omo bisando byawe, Unzamalir’omo lwanzo, Ndole ko busu bwawe. Umbe Mwami rikuminya, Uminyikale kundu, Namikala n’Omulamya, Yo bulamiro bwaghe.

string.name: number165
string.htmlData:
165. NYIKWANZIRE
I Love Thee
CH 343 - Doh is Eb

1. Nyikwanzire Mwami, Wasi nyikwanzire, Nyikwanzire, Yesu, Okwilab’ebyosi. Nyikwanzire, Yesu, Nawe unasi, Emibiri yaghe, Iyakangania byo.

2. Butseme, butseme, kundu butahulwa, Obutseme bwaghe, Sibwesombolawa. Naleby’obuteke, Obw’elubula, Asyangabira bo, omo bwenge buwe.

3. Yesu, Mwami waghe, Ni w’ukamb’ebyosi, Eby’erilamibwa, Ne eby’erikota. Nyikupipe kundu, N’erikwimbira, Omo bwenge bwawe, ‘Nyanziky’omutima.

4. Nakusosekania ki Mulamya waghe, Utula n’obwenge, Ka sulibinduka! Neryo nyikupipe, Inakukenga, Omutima waghe, ‘Sule mo butseme.

string.name: number166
string.htmlData:
166. RIBWE RYA KERA
Rock Of Ages
CH 474 - Doh is C

1. Uwe Ribwe ry’engebe, Kuwe nasyasayira, Kera wabirihola, Busana n’olukogho. Nyilusaye kw’ebibi, Nyitok’ikind’enzighu.

2. Emwisi w’emibiri, Sinangaberererya, Nangakola n’omuhwa, Ebibi sibirihwa. Niwe wangatulamya, Kw’ebibi byetu byosi.

3. Muna kihugho kino, Sihali omulamo, Ikirirya ni rike, N’eriminya siriri. Ingye mundu w’ebibi, Ungwatikye nyilame.

4. Nyinemulindirira, Ekiro wasyaswasa, Nasyayir’endata, N’eriyakulola ko. N’eribya n’obutseme, Omo mutima waghe.

string.name: number167
string.htmlData:
167. KIBANZA KYA KERA
Firm Foundation
CH 255 - Doh is G

1. Kibanza kya kera, Inywe b’Omwami, Momwahirwa ewenyu mo kinywa kiwe. Niki kinene akabugh’Omwami, Rikirirya ryenyu, Neryo rikanye. Rikrirya ryenyu, Neryo rikanye.

2. Wabwirwa soka maghestis w’ekiro Syonyusi syeritebya sisikanye. Ngandisyabya nawe ‘nakutokesya, ‘Malighe owakasa, syakubahaye. Malighe owakasa, syakubahaye.

3. Ukandisyabala omo muliro, Nasyakuh’amaka inakuhemba. Suheribawe nikw’ebibi byawe, Syasyasighalira zahabu syawe. Syasyasighalira zahabu syawe.

4. N’omundu oyo wayiketera ngye, ‘Maka w’eriherya syangamubahya. Na hake enzighu simukole ki!, Ni ngandisyamuteya omo malighe. Ni ngandisyamuteya omo malighe.

string.name: number168
string.htmlData:
168. MUKAMA MULISYA
The Lord Is My Shepherd
CH 405 - Doh is G

1. Mukama Mulisya, Sinyiri nzama, Kanzondola mo bulisiryo bwaghe. Akanyipolesy’amaghetsi owene, Akanyisubulaya namatala.

2. Namalaba mo musya gh’oluholo, We Muteya waghe, singangubaha. Mutso wawe ‘niatok’erinyiteya, Wamanyihumulya sindibula ki.

3. N’omo bulighe, ‘wases’obutara, N’olutehi lwaghe loswire kundu. Wamabihakaby’omutw’amaghuta, Naghe nasyaswakubulya ki kwehi?

4. Neryo olukogho n’obubuya, Byanganyikwam’ebiro byosi. Naghe nasyikal’omo nyumba y’Omwami, Nahiko omo Bwami buwe b’olwanzo.

string.name: number169
string.htmlData:
169. MWIMAYE OBWAMI
Heir Of The Kingdom
CH 185 - Doh is Eb

1. Mwimaye Obwami kuki wayato, Hakuhi rilama ukayato. Ubuke, hangana, wambal’engabo, Yo luba kundu, ndambi yikalaba.

2. Mwimaye Obwami kuk’iwalinda? Kuki sulimaya ebihembo? Neryo ambala Omulamy’akasa, Ni luba mukokaye akahika.

3. Ebihanda binene by’ekihugho, Binemulwa n’erisangulana. Isighubaha byahika, mwasima, Ebiminyikalo byasyahika.

4. Samalira matseme w’ekihugho, Neryo ayo akalaba luba. Kundul’ebikoba bikubohire, Mwimaye Obwami, mwase luba.

5. Sumb’omutwe, ulebaye embere, Nyamuhang’asyasa n’erihenia. Ryuba rikabanika omo bitwa, Mwimaye Obwami n’obutseme

string.name: number170
string.htmlData:
170. MUHANGIKI MWAMI
My Maker And My king
CH 71 - Doh is D

1. Muhangiki mwami, Bindu byosi byawe, Mon’omo bwenge bwawe inyinemutsumulwa, Mon’omo bwenge bwawe inyinemutsumulwa nawe.

2. Uwe wahangika, ngayiketera We, Neryo singangayipip’obwenge bwawe bungi, Neryo singangayipipa obwenge bwawe bungi.

3. Nasyakuha kyahi? Ebyosi ni byawe, Olwanz’ukanzondola mutima wa wasingya, Olwanz’ukanzondola mutima wa wasingya.

4. Unyih’olukogho, nyibye n’obutoki, Eribya ho kuwe, Mwami, biro byaghe ni We, Eribya ho kuwe, Mwami, ebiro byaghe ni We.

string.name: number171
string.htmlData:
171. KWE! MUTEYA
What of The Night?
CH 184 - Doh is D

1. Kwe! Muteya k’oluhimbo, L’omuyi we Sayuni, Emyatsi yiwe y’ekiro? Engyakya ni hakuhi, Haly’ebiminyikalo eby’erikya? Haly’ebiminyikalo eby’erikya?

2. Nery’omo lughendo lwetu, Twalebya eyisirya, Twaghotsera omo ngetsi, Kisokero sihali, Kundu, kundu, Twasyalol’oko Bwami, Kundu, kundu, Twasyalol’oko Bwami.

3. Twasyaleby’ekyakakala, Engununu y’engyakya, Mbuya yihenirye kundu, Yakolery’elubula, Mutsemer’ilama liri hakuhi, Mutsemer’ilama liri hakuhi.

4. Twasamalir’ekitsutsu, Eyisirya sihali, Tuy’ember’eyo yoluba, Twasyaleby’eyisirya, Mutseme mwimbe esyonyimbo syenyu, Mutseme mwimbe esyonyimbo syenyu.

string.name: number172
string.htmlData:
172. MUBUKE ABAGHOMBE
How Long?
CH 354 - Doh is D

1. Mubuke abaghombe, Abandu b’Omwami, Muwaty’omo maboko, Engabo sya Yesu, Mo nzira y’erikinda, Twasondolwa na Yesu, Tubye n’omuhwa mungi, Imo twasyakinda.

2. Engubi syamabugha, Mwase imwe bosi, Embita y’obuyingo, Ni bihembo byenyu. Enzighu syamakala, Muhangane n’erilwa, Mubye n’omuhwa mungi, Mukinde Sitani.

3. Mubuke na muyalwe, Simutike-tike, Sihabye ukasiba, Tungerera Yesu, Muhek’ebyuma byenyu, By’amalwa : Rikirirya, Muhabwe erikinda, N’obutseme bungi.

4. Mubuke kuba luba, Muyakwe kutsibu, Mwikiriray’erina, Riwe mwasyakinda, Neryo ebyuma byosi, Mubih’Omwami Yesu, Mwasyaban’obuholo, Ob’omo lubula.

string.name: number173
string.htmlData:
173. NGASONDA ERIKIRIRYA
O For A Faith
CH 245 - Doh is Bb

1. Ngasonda erikirirya, Rikirirya kundu, Rite mo ititimana, kindu kyosi, Ndambi y’eryaghalwa, Ndambi y’eryaghalwa.

2. Erite yitong’omwisusumana bulighe, Neryo mo mighulu yo mwagha, Inikirirya Nyamuhanga, Nikirirya Nyamuhanga.

3. Rikirirya ryakolerya, Neryo n’omo malwa, Siryeryubaha omwirimya, Kutse bulighe obw’enzala, Enzala n’eryaghalwa.

4. Syalyubaha ekihugho, Eriponwa mukyo, Syangatoghibwa mw’itebya, n’amabehi, Bibi n’eryubahya, Ebibi n’eryubahya.

5. Mwamy’umbe erikirirya, Nery’imo natoka, Erigherya muna kihugho kino, Erimya obutseme, Erimya obutseme.

string.name: number174
string.htmlData:
174. OBUTSEME BULI OKO BASYAYA YO
How Cheering!
CH 387 - Doh is E

1. Obutseme buli oko basyaya yo, Akine ho mwirimya wa hisi, Byamusikya, inakinda ritebya ry’enzighu, Byamusikya, inakinda ritebya ry’enzighu.

2. Ebyo byatwibukya by’obuluhukiro, Aho batunganene basyabya; Ibayibera n’Omwira obutaghabana, Ibayibera n’Omwira obutaghabana.

3. Ni kihugho kite banika mo bibi, N’eritebya kasiryehika yo. Ho hali obutseme butesyahwa na kera, Ho hali obutseme butesyahwa na kera.

4. Sihali oyo wasyabya akalira, Luholo silwesyahika yo, Esyondulani syaho basyabya ho na kera, Esyondulani syaho basyabya ho na kera.

5. Kyangatuha ndambi yangahika luba, Twalangir’Omulamya akasa, Akatutwala omo kihugho ekibuya, Akatutwala omo kihugho ekibuya.

string.name: number175
string.htmlData:
175. MULAMYA KA YO MULISYA
Saviour, Like A Shepherd
CH 394 - Doh is Eb

1. Mulamya ka yo Muslisya, Utusondele lino, Ututwale bulisiryo, Himba ndek’ekitunga. Mwami Yesu iyowene, Yukasondola ghuwe, Mwami Yesu iyowene, Yukasondola ghuwe.

2. Twe bana bawe ubye Omwira, uwe Muteya wetu, Buhyo bwawe teghaya bo, Situkole ebibi. Mwami Yesu towe lino, Twamasab’ibuyira, Mwami Yesu towe lino, Twamasab’ibuyira.

3. Wabiritulagha nikwa wasyaligha abandu, Wasyaghenyera bo, Eriha b’olukogho. Mwami Yesu tukwanzire, Ribya bawe kwenene, Mwami Yesu tukwanzire, Ribya bawe kwenene.

string.name: number176
string.htmlData:
176. RIKIRIRYA RIRI
Blessed Hope
CH 379 - Doh is F

1. Rikirirya riri, Ery’enzwer’enene, Kwilab’eritsema lyosi lya muna kihugho.

2. Syongununu mbuya sikakoleraya, Kw’itwe mughulu w’erihola w’erilubuka.

3. Twamaghalwa mo mweyo buba, bulighe, Mulenge akatubwira: Mwami abanzire.

4. Erilw’e Kalwari, mulengy’akabugha, Ngununu iyakolery’erikirirya ryetu.

string.name: number177
string.htmlData:
177. SIHALI MWIRIMYA
No Night There
CH 558 - Doh is Eb

1. Mo Kihugho kibuya, Kiri m’omuyisa, Asyabya ho nakera, Sihali mwirimya.

Erisuba mo :
Sihali erira, sihali n’oluholo, Biro sibyendisyibukwa, Sihali mwirimya.

2. N’esyonyusi ni lulu, Mo muyi mubuya, N’enzira ni zahabu, Sihali mwirimya.

3. N’omo muyi mubuya, Sihaly’erikinga, N’olusi olw’engebe, Lunemusenda ho.

4. Sihali sond’eryuba, Yesu yona ryuba, Yu kakoleray’ehosi, Sihali mwirimya.

string.name: number178
string.htmlData:
178. MWAMI BYASYABYA KIRO KI?
Christ Returneth
CH 536 - Doh is D

1. Eh mbino ni ndambi y’erisesukala, Maseghe w’eryub’iniahigh’omwirimya. Neryo akasyasa Yesu omw’ihenia, Akandisyakoky’abuwe.

Erisuba mo :
Byasyabya kiro ki Mwami, Mughulu twasyimba: Anemwasa, Mwami Yesu, Aleluya, Amen, Aleluya, Amen.

2. Eh mbin’omw’itungi, eh mbin’omw’igholo, Eh bin’omo kati kanene, mwirimya, Asyahwa ho omw’ihenia, ery’asyasa; Akandisyakoky’abuwe.

3. Butseme twamahabwa obuta hola, Buta syasunga oko ndwala, misonia. Erisyatwalw’omo bitu omw’ihenia; Akandisyasy’oko buwe.

string.name: number179
string.htmlData:
179. OMUKWI AMASA
Behold, The Bridgegroom
C.S. 868 - Doh is A

1. Wasyabya unemuteya Yesu, Asyasya, Wasyabya unemuteya Yesu, Asyasya, Lebay’akasa, Lebay’akasa, Uteghaye lebay’anemwasa

Erisuba mo :
Masa, Omukwi amasa,amasa, Masa, Omukwi amasa, amasa, Masa, amasa, masa, Amasa, Uteghaye mas’Omwukwi masa.

2. Mukokotay’esisek’amasa, amasa, Mukokotay’esisek’amasa, amasa, Amasa, amasa, masa, amasa, Uteghaye mas’Omwukwi masa.

3. Mwase tuhindane nay’amasa, amasa, Mwase tuhindane nay’amasa, amasa, Amasa kundu, amasa kundu, Uteghaye mas’Omwukwi masa.

4. Tumwimbire Aleluy’amasa, amasa, Tumwimbire Aleluy’amasa, amasa, Amasa kundu, amasa kundu, Tumwimbire Aleluy’amasa

string.name: number180
string.htmlData:
180. SITWASY’EKIRO
We Kow Not The Hour
CH 540 - Doh is C

1. Sitwasy’ekiro, Yesu akandisyasa, Nikw’omughulu ali hakuhi kundu. Biminyikalo byabirihik’ebyosi N’ekiro tutasi.

Erisuba mo :
Asyasa, tulinde tuteghaye, Asyasa, Aleluya, Aleluya, Asyasy’oko bitu, N’erihenia ery’Ise N’ekiro tutasi.

2. Atunganania, Ekitabu ky’obwami, Bakaminyira omo eby’ekwenene Eryasa riwe, omo Baminyereri, N’ekiro tutatsi.

3. Luseke lwetu, siluhumber’eryaka; Tukole lino, tulindiriry’Omwami. Tumupipire situbye ne eryumbya, N’ekiro tutasi.

string.name: number181
string.htmlData:
181. TWAMULINDA
Wainting And Watching
CH 542 - Doh is Eb

1. Sinyasi endambi asyasa, Mwitungu kutsy’omw’igholo, Mbino ndambi ey’erigholo, Mbinw’eryuba ryahuluka. Akatubwira tuteghaye, Twakay’esiseke syetu, Neryo amasa atwegheye, Tubye itukamulinda.

Erisuba mo :
Twamulinda ne (Riteya, tukakulinda uwe), Twamulinda ne (Riteya, tukakulinda), Twamulinda ne (Riteya, tukakulinda uwe), Twateya itwamulinda.

2. Namibuk’olukogho luwe, Nzwere y’erilama lyetu, Mwasigha n’enyumba nyibuya, Asy’aholere ababi. Nyasi ko byasyamutsemesya, Neryo ng’itwe bandu buwe, Twamakangany’olwanzo lwetu, Tuby’itunamulindire.

3. Yesu Mulamya Ekitagha, We wasi ko ngateghaya ; Erikulola ko lyowene, N’erisyakokibwa nawe. Wasa oko bandi abandu, Neryo ng’Omutsweri wabo, Kwingye wasyabya Omwir’oyo, Nateya n’erikulinda.

string.name: number182
string.htmlData:
182. TWALANGIR’AMASALALI
Gleams Of The Golden Morning
CH 547 - Doh is G

1. Twamabihik’oko mughulu w’eryasa rya Yesu, Akasyahek’abandu buw’omo nyumba y’endata.

Erisuba mo :
Twalangir’amasalali w’eryuba Akahigh’omwirimya; Twalangir’amasalali w’eryuba N’erilubuka.

2. Haghuma n’abalaika buwe, Mwami asyasa, Akandisyatwal’Ababuyirire, Butahola.

3. Engulu inemutulw’ehosi, Oko bihanda; Omwami w’obuheruky’amasa, n’Engubi yiwe.

4. Abanze abaghabana kera, Basyahindana; Misonia yabo ab’obulighe, Yasyasangulwa.

string.name: number183
string.htmlData:
183. MWATSI MUBUYA
Hold Fast Till I Come
CH 548 - Doh is G

1. Mwatsi mubuya, Oko babuya, Lebaya ngandisya luba kundu; Ubye embangi, omo butseme, Wasyahabwa akakira katehwa.

Erisuba mo :
Uteghay’erikirirya ryawe, Ekihugho kihya ikyasasya, Wase wingire omo butseme, Wasyahabwa akakira katehwa.

2. Twasyateya itunemusaba, Akasyasa ng’omurahy’oko bandi; Tunasi Ye ngo kwali hakuhi, Nikwa sitwasy’ekiro nga ni kyahi.

3. Tukayiketer’Ekinywa kiwe, Neryo kyo kikabugh’eryasa riwe; Rikirirya ryetu y’endaghane, Ko ngasyasa luba: Ubye Embangi.

string.name: number184
string.htmlData:
184. BUTSEME OKO KIHUGHO
Joy To The World
CH 189 - Doh is D

1. Butseme oko kihugho, Yesu akasyasa, Buli mweyo mwangirire, byabumbawa byosi bimbe. Byabumbawa bimbe, Byabumbawa bimbe, Byosi bimbe, Byabumbawa byosi bimbe.

2. N’Omwami asyatabala, Bandu neryo bimbe, Miti n’ebitwa n’amabwe, Mwimbire butseme bungi. Mwimbire butseme, Mwimbire butseme, Mwimbire Omwami n’obutseme bungi.

3. Akasyatabala ndeke, Akasyatuhana, Bandu bubuya buwe, Lwanzo lw’eriswekera kundu. Olwanzo lw’eriswekya, Olwanzo lw’eriswekya, Olwanzo lw’eriswekya, lwanzo luwe.

string.name: number185
string.htmlData:
185. RIBYA YO BYASYATUHA KI?
To Be There
CH 199 - Doh is G

1. Nikwa ko tukanabugha, Eby’ekihugho kibuya, Tukole bibuya byaho; Ribya yo ryasatuha ki? Tukahul’enzira ya ho, Sihakabir’ezahabu, Neryo twamuzunzikania, twahika yo twasyabya ho.

2. Twabugha ko hasosire, Hat’ebibi n’oluholo, Kutse ritebya siriri, Twahika yo twasyabya ho. Tukabugha n’eby’olwanzo, N’esyokanzu syasyambalwa, Tukatsemera byo kundu, Ribya yo ryasatuha ki?

3. Nyitimbirwe ko n’ebibi, Ndungananay’eriya yo ; Neryo naghe nyiyowe mo, erisyabya yo kwenene. Neryo twasyalendera omo kihugho ky’obutseme, Haghuma n’Abalaika, na Yesu Mulamya wetu.

string.name: number186
string.htmlData:
186. TWASUBWIRE ERIKULAKIRA
Lord, We Have Met
CH 26 - Doh is F

1. Tata Mwenge twasubwire, erkulakira, Twamayikehya kundu, twayolobeka; Twitsutse eribuyirwa.

2. Twamasa erikusima, Kowa watuteya kundu, Ubye ukatwibuka watutsumula; Iwasubuly’ah’uli.

3. Ayi, twabere bahanya, Tuly’ab’erighanwa kundu, Neryo tukakita oko nzira yawe ; Neryo lino twamaswasa.

4. Mwami w’emiyisa yosi, Ni nawe ukahitaya, Lebaya mo lukogho, Twamakughonga; Tusule n’Ekinywa kyawe.

string.name: number187
string.htmlData:
187. KANDI MULAMYA
Our Parting Hymn
CH 34 - Doh is Ab

1. Kandi Mulamya tukakupipa, Erina ryawe ka ni ribuya! Tukalind’Ekinywa ky’obuholo, N’omughulu tukasuba eka.

2. Tuhy’obuholo m’onzira yetu, Utuby’embere n’enyuma wetu! Uteghay’eminywa oko bibi, Itwakupipa n’erikukenga.

3. Tuhy’obuholo mo kiro eki! Kyakakala kihigh’omwirimya! Utulinde tubye bawe Yesu, N’ekiro kibye ngomo ritungi.

4. Tuhy’obuholo omo kihugho, Tuwatikaye omo bulighe. Neryo twitab’omulenge wawe, Tuhy’obuholo obw’erikota.

string.name: number188
string.htmlData:
188. NIKWA NABYA N’EBIBI
CH 238 - Doh is Ab

1. Nikwa nabya n’ebibi, Yesu mwanyitongolya, Mwanyutir’omusasi, Mwangul’omo luholo, Nasyabya naye kera, Ng’omutahi n’momuti.

2. Ighenyera rya Yesu, Ryusulaya ekyanya, Siryangalengwa ko ki, Ryasyabya ho na kera; Niwe wanyibwira ryo, Ngye sinabya nyasi ryo.

3. Nikwa nabya n’ebibi, Yesu ‘labire byosi, Anasy’obwera bwaghe, Andamy’omo malighe; Ndi omukobe wuwe, Sindyedi syaghalirwa.

string.name: number189
string.htmlData:
189. SITULI N’OMUYI OMO KIHUGHO
No Abiding City Here
CH 308 - Doh is G

1. Situli n’omuy’omo kihugho, Tuli mukyo tuli abaghendi. Nikw’ekyo tukatsemera, Neryo tukasond’omuyi, Alabire obubuya.

2. Situli n’omuy’omo kihugho, Tukaya ewetu elubula. Ye Sayuni itula ho, Muli kyakakala kundu, Kikakoleraya ndeke.

3. Neryo tukadisyatsemera yo, Ahw’abaghendi basyaluhuka. Kyangamb’ebipupa lino, Ngaghuluka ngasyaya yo, Ngayibera nawe Mwami.

4. Mutima waghe lek’erighanya, Lebay’endambi Mwami ambere. Nyo nyibuya, yo nyibuya, Naghe inayiketera, Rihik’okw’ibirikirwa.

string.name: number190
string.htmlData:
190. ERINA RYA YESU
Precious Name of Jesus
CH 523 - Doh is Ab

1. Yesu ni Mwami w’abami, Oyo abiritwanza, Twamaby’itwamikirirya, Tukandilama lino.

Erisuba mo :
Erina rya Yesu, Erina ly’Omulamya, Tumwanzi, biro byosi, Ni Mwami Mwenge wetu.

2. Tuyire erina riwe, Mw’inene biro byosi, Ni erina ly’erilamya, Kumbe wamikirirya.

3. Usaby’oko rina riwe, Wamabya n’obulighe; Akandikuh’obutseme, N’akaghala kanene.

string.name: number191
string.htmlData:
191. YESU MULAMYA W’EKWENENE
Blessed Assurance
CH 608 - Doh is D

1. Yesu Mulamya w’ekwenene, Akamb’obutseme n’obuholo, Nyihabaw’erilama riwe, Nyeribw’omo musasi wuwe.

Erisuba mo :
Omwatsi oyo lwimbo lwaghe, Biro byosi nasyamupipa. Omwatsi oyo lwimbo lwaghe, Biro byosi nasyamupipa.

2. Namayiteka inatsema N’omw’ikirirya ngasung’Omwami. Akandetera Malaika, Bakanyiteya andamaye.

3. Sindi n’ekindu akandwala, Mwisi wa Yesu inatsumulwa; Ngalindirira omw’isika, Bwenge buwe bunyitolere.

string.name: number192
string.htmlData:
192. MO MUSALABA GH’OMULAMYA
Glory To His Name
C.S. 300 - Doh is Ab

1. Mo musalaba gh’Omulamya, Aho honasab’erilama, Mutima waghe kamweribwa, Na apipawe.

Erisuba mo :
Na apipawe, Na apipawe. Kwamwanyilamy’omo musasi Na apipawe.

2. Ko Musalaba w’eryaghalwa, Yesu ane omo mutima. Kamwanyilamy’omo musasi, Na apipawe.

3. Nyitsemire namabilama, Mwisi wa Yesu inatsumulwa; N’oko muti mwanyiholera, Na apipawe.

4. Yesu kalamya mo musasi, Anyilusaya omo bibi, N’erinyitwala omw’ilama N’oko muti mwanyiholera, Na apipawe.

string.name: number193
string.htmlData:
193. ERIBYA WA YESU
His Way With Thee
C.S. 58 - Doh is G

1. Eribya wa Yesu kwehi ni sonda ryawe, Wangaghenda naye mo nzira enge, Ukasonda iwahek’omuheke wawe? Abye Omusondoli.

Erisuba mo :
Butoki buwe bukutolere. Musasi wuwe iniasyakwera, Ikw’ebyo iwaligha byowene Akol’erisonda liwe nawe.

2. Ukasond’iwitaba wabirikirwa ko? Waban’obuholo wamuh’ebyosi? Wasond’obutoko isibakeha lino? Abye Omusondoli.

3. Ukasond’obutseme omo Bwami buwe? Wangakinda omw’irengwa ko ryosi? Wangakola omubiri wuwe gho ndeke? Abye Omusondoli.

string.name: number194
string.htmlData:
194. HAMABYA OLWANZO
Love At Home
C.S. 580 - Doh is Ab

1. Bindu byosi byowene, Hamaby’olwanzo, N’omulenge mubuya, Hamaby’olwanzo. Hali buholo aho, N’obutsem’omo nyumba, N’eribya ho ribuya, Hamaby’olwanzo.

Erisuba mo :
Hamabya Olwanzo, Biro byosi buholo; Hamaby’olwanzo.

2. Butseme omo nyumba, Hamaby’olwanzo, Sihali eritsuro, Hamaby’olwanzo. Akalyo kakasiha, N’amalim’iniuwana, N’eribya ho ribuya, Hamaby’olwanzo.

3. N’omo lubul’endata, Hali butseme, Bamalangir’olwanzi, Mo nyumba yetu. Meso akatsema n’ebihangikwa by’Omwami, Nyamuhang’inalenya, Hamaby’olwanzo.

4. Uwe Yesu mbye wawe, Wawe kwenene, Neryo imo hasyabya, Lwanzo mo nyumba. Nasikala buholo, Indasyakol’ebibi, Nasyatsumulwa kundu, Hamaby’olwanzo.

string.name: number195
string.htmlData:
195. TUHE OMULIRO W’ERIBYA HO
O For That Flame
CH 210 - Doh is Bb

1. Tuhe omuliro wawe, W’eribya ho waka kera, Mowasondola endate, Ababuyirira bawe.

2. Habo mwey’ow’abikere, Mo mweyo wa Ibrahimu, Kandi Mulikyetu Paulo, Atokesibwa Muliro.

3. Lukogho lwawe siluli, N’amaka ebiro bino? Ng’omughulu owa Musa, Ayubu n’owa Eliya?

4. Mughulu wa kera Mwami, Wibuke n’omw’ighenyera, Bukay’emitima yetu, Mo Muka Abuyirire.

string.name: number196
string.htmlData:
196. MULI KAGHALA OMO MUSASI
There Is Power In The Blood
C.S. 27 - Doh is Bb

1. Nikw’ukasond’erikind’ebibi, Kiriry’omusasi wa Yesu, Nikw’ukasond’eky’erikinda mo, Gh’omusasi gh’Omulamya.

Erisuba mo :
S-A :Muli kaghal’omo musasi,
\t\t We Kyana ky’Embuli,
\t\t Muli kaghal’omo musasi,
\t\t Gh’Omwana wa Nyamuhanga.

T-B :Kundu muli kaghala mo musasi,
\t\t We Kyana ky’Embuli,
\t\t Kundu muli kaghala mo musasi,
\t\t Gh’Omwana

2. Ukasonda neryo iweribwa, Kiriry’omusasi wa Yesu, Wase mweghay’oko musalaba, Akweray’omo musasi.

3. Neryo ukasonda iwahenia, Kiriry’omusasi wa Yesu, Angakwery’ebitingu by’ebibi, Gh’omusasi gh’Omulamya.

4. Ukasond’erikolera Yesu, Kiriry’omusasy’akalamya, Ukasonda waby’ukamupipa, Kiriry’omusasi Wuwe.

string.name: number197
string.htmlData:
197. KIRO YESU ASYASA
There’ll Be No Dark valley
C.S. 854 - Doh is F

1. Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Kiro Yesu asyasa.

Erisuba mo :
Kiro Yesu asyasa (Asa), Kiro Yesu asyasa (Asa) , Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Kiro Yesu asyasa.

2. Twasyimb’esyonyimbo sy’obutseme, Twasyimb’esyonyimbo sy’obutseme, Twasyimb’esyonyimbo sy’obutseme, Kiro Yesu asyasa.

3. Sihali misonia asyabyasa, Sihali misonia asyabyasa, Sihali misonia asyabyasa, Kiro Yesu asyasa.

4. N’eryaghalwa ryosi ryasahwa ho, N’eryaghalwa ryosi ryasahwa ho, N’eryaghalwa ryosi ryasahwa ho, Kiro Yesu asyasa.

string.name: number198
string.htmlData:
198. YESU Y’OMWIRA ULABIRE
The Best Friend Is Jesus
CH 528 - Doh is G

1. Yesu y’Omwira ulabire, Amalighe akwaghalya, Yukaseng’ebironda, by’omo mutima wawe, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.

Erisuba mo :
Yesu’Mwira ulabire (Alabire), Yesu’Mwira ulabire (Alabire), Wamaw’iniakulamya, Walak’iniakowa, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.

2. Ngeghay’Omwira ulabire, Syalingung’omo malighe, Nyireke anzodole, Sihali Eryubaha, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.

3. Nery’obulighe bwamahika, Ibwandetera eryubaha, Sinzwek’omo mutima, Nikwa ambanganire, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.

4. Twasyabya twahik’elubula, Twahindana n’abo twasigha, Wasingya wasyabugha, Tukamupipa Iye, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.

string.name: number199
string.htmlData:
199. MWAMI APIPAWE
To God Be The Glory
CH 647 - Doh is Ab

1. Mwami apipaw’omo myatsi yosi, Olwanzo luwe ka mwatuma Yesu. Ka mwayiteka eribya ho liwe, Tubye neyo engebe y’erikota.

Erisuba mo :
Mupipe, mupipe, Ekihugho kyosi Mupipe, mupipe, Abandu batseme Na wase ku Tata, Ku Yesu Mwana Iwasyamup’omo myatsi yosi.

2. Rilama ryoswire, Bihembo byetu, Ngaghane y’Omwami oko kihugho. Abakamwikiriraya kwenene; Abo bobawite eribuyirwa.

3. Mwatukangirirya myatsi minene, Abiritubwir’erilama ryetu, Neryo eky’eriswekera kinene, Yesu akasyas’itwamulola ko.

string.name: number200
string.htmlData:
200. OMUBUYIRIRE, MWAMI MUTOKI
Holy, Holy, Holy
CH 73 - Doh is E

1. Omubuyirire, Mwami Mutoki, Mo ngyakyakya, twasyapip’itunemwimba. Omubuyirire, Mwami gh’olukogho, Mwami w’ebyosi, Kera na kera.

2. Omubuyirire, N’Abalaika, Bangi kundu banemukusaba abosi. Kighonye n’ebighonye, banemukusaba, Oyutula na kera na kera.

3. Omubuyirire, Yukalamaya, Omwirimya syalikubis’ekindu kyosi. Omubuyirire, Uwu wene kundu, Uli n’amaka mangi n’olwanzo.
